Theory and practice with compass,transit,level,and stadia.
Computations of area,earthwork volumes,and horizontal and vertical curves;astronomical observations;boundary surveying;and map plotting.

description.zh: 目的在使學生瞭解電腦基本知識及程式撰寫方法，以應用於土木工程問題之處理與解決。授課內容包括：電子計算機概論、資料型態、程式語言、輸出入陳述與格式、迴圈及副程式、檔案開啟，及其他應用套裝軟體之介紹。
description.en:
Specifications of language syntax and semantics by grammars and automata and by attribute grammars,denotational semantics,and action equations;algebraic,denotational,and 
operational semantics,application of formal specifications to construction of software tools.

description.zh: 介紹單位換算與有效數位，元素的原子結構、化學方程式平衡與計算，反應熱，氣體與氣體定律，大氣層與環境污染，週期表，化學鍵，化合物的分子結構，熱力學，動力學，反應機構，平衡常數，氧化與還原，酸鹼反應，電化學，混合物的分離及現代科技材料，奠定良好化學基礎。
description.en: Introduction to the principles of chemistry and properties of matter, which are explained in terms of modern chemical theory with emphasis on conceptual problems. Individual topics include gas, stoichiometry, atomic structure, chemical bonding, and the states of matter, energy relation, acid-base theory and oxidation-reduction reactions, the chemistry of metallic and nonmetallic elements, nuclear chemistry.

description.zh: 土木工程師到底是大地的彫刻師？還是地球的劊子手？透過本課程的介紹與討論，將可使未來的土木工程師及早在「利用厚生，利國利民」與「尊重自然與保護人類」之間思考其應尋的方向，擺脫「一群有知識的野蠻人」之惡名，達成「永續利用」與「天人合一」建設目標。
description.en: How can Civil Engineer construct the infrastracture without destroying environmental system ? In this course,we try to search and discuss the suitable solutions.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技四年級上學期實施選修專項分組教學，課程修畢有一學分並計入畢業學分內。由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: In first semester, Senior students can choose to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. When they are finishing the course that can get the credit, also can account in graduate credit.  For Senior level, Classes are giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 學生與教授討論擬定之研究題目,在教授個別指導下,進行實驗之研究,以培養學生尋找相關資料,文獻及獨立研究的訓練,並將其研究成果撰寫成報告並公開發表練習。
description.en: To make students able to carry out independent study.  Students will be assigned a short topic.  An independent experimental design, data analysis, and final report presentation are necessary for this course.

description.zh: 本課程之目的在培養學生論文尋找及期刊選讀之能力，每位學生必須針對專一之問題尋找最近相關的資料。問題的認定，由老師協助資料之準備及口頭報告等是學生不可少的。且一學期至少須報告2次。學期成績將以學生在課堂上參與的態度及兩份書面資料決定。
description.en: This course is aimed at providing a training of review and paper studies for 4th grade students. Students are requested to search for the latest papers for a specific topic. Presentation and discussion are required for all attendants, twice persemester. The final score for a student will be determined based on students interaction in the class and two written reports.

description.zh: 以纖維的物理化學性質及纖維的微細構造為基礎，依纖維高分子素材使用的目的，要求賦與各種機能性及感觀性能。就物理性、化學性的立場，講述練漂劑應用理論；染料構造與染著性；印花色糊黏彈性與印花工學；及纖維表面能相關的整理工學理論。並申述合理化的染整系統及目前染整新技術的趨向與應用。
description.en: On the basis of physical & chemical properties of fibers and their micro-structures,various functional and sensible performance according to their end-use are given.This course is investigating, from physical and chemical point,the following subjects such as the application theory of scouring and leaching agents; the structure of dyestuff and dyeing behavior; the Rheology of printing paste and printing engineering; fiber surface energy in association with relative theory of finishing engineering.  The optimization of textile finishing system and new development and application of textile Finishing are also discussed.

name.en: Principles pf Dyeing and Finishing Lab.

description.zh:
以染整原理習得的知識為基礎，實際應用於染整實習；並利用各種檢測儀器的測試，對其機能性或染整效果加以探討。包括染整前處理工程的練漂、絲光、合纖的鹼減量加工；染色的均一性、堅牢度；印花色糊的發色性、均染性、尖銳性；及棉的防皺、防縮；合纖的柔軟、抗靜電加工；特殊機能的撥水、 撥油、 
防撚、抗污等整理實習。
description.en: On the basis of knowledge from the principle of textile finishing, various experiments are carried out. Different instruments are used to measure and study their functional performance and effect. The practice include pretreatment such as scouring, bleaching, mercerizing and Alkali Dwight for synthetic fiber, Leveling and fastness of dyeing ,Color yield, Sharpness of printing, Shrinkage and crease resistance for cotton, Softening and antistatic treatment for synthetic fiber, Special functional finishing such as water repellency, oil resistance, flame retardancy ,soil resistance are also studied.

description.zh:
使學生們習得在紡織與製衣工業上，從國際與歷史觀點來探討目前與未來經營管理上的問題
﹝1﹞ 全球紡織與製衣工業的經濟學
﹝2﹞ 國內紡織業目前的情況
﹝3﹞ 經營策略之演進
﹝4﹞ 經營環境分析與其研究
﹝5﹞ 國際競爭之策略
description.en:
The purpose of this study is provide an international and historical perspective on the situation in the Taiwan's textile and clothing industries and from this perspective on the suggest alternative for its future development. We begin our study of management and discuss the facts that form the foundation for the rest of the study.
﹝1﹞ Economics of the global textile and clothing industries.
﹝2﹞ The current state of Taiwan's textile industry.
﹝3﹞ The evolution of competitive strategies.
﹝4﹞ Environment analysis and managerial research.
﹝5﹞ Countermeasures for global competition.

name.en: Polymerization and Synthetic Fiber Spinning Lab.

description.zh: 使學生瞭解實驗方法，自己能成功合成纖維。粘液嫘縈之製備、銅氨嫘縈之製備、Nylan66之聚合、Nylan66之界面聚縮合、PVA 薄膜之製備、聚苯乙烯之製備、以粘度法測苯乙烯之MV、PVA 之縮醛化。
description.en: The object of this lab are to learn the skills of polymerization and to synthesize organic fibers successfully.  The course includes the synthesis of viscose rayon, cuprammonium rayon, nylon 66, polyvinylalcohol, polystyrene and interfacial polymerization of nylon66.  This viscosity determination of molecular weight of polystyrene as well as the aldehyde reaction of polyvinylalcohol is also included.

description.zh: 本課程討論液晶之形成原理及其在高科技之應用，其內容包括1.液晶之來由及其分類2.液晶之電場與磁場效應3.液晶之光學性質4.液晶顯示器（STN LCD,TFT LCD）及其他應用5.液向型液晶及其在生物體與日常生活體品之應用6.高分子液晶與高強度纖維
description.en: The course is an introduction to Liquid Crystal Materials. Including 1.What are Liquid Crystal? 2.The story of Liquid Crystal；3.Electric and Magnetic Field Effects；4.Light and Nematic Liquid Crystal；5. Liquid Crystal Displays(STN-LCD, TFT-LCD) and other applications；6.Lyotropic Liquid Crystal；7.Polymer Liquid Crystals.

description.zh: 介紹近年來新發展的織物之染色原理並進行實驗之研究。
description.en: This course is to introducing the dyeing method and dyeing theory of recently developed fibers, also conducting the research on which unsolving dyeing problems.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 紡織產品之製程甚長，經過各製程之產品均須實施檢驗，以確保品質之正常，為在紡織品生產過程中不可缺少之一環，紡織檢驗學是研討應用在紡織纖維、紡紗、織造、印染整理、製衣過程中各項檢驗之理論與實務，闡述其適用範圍、檢驗設備、檢驗程序、相關標準或規範、檢驗結果，並將所獲得之檢驗結果，發生優劣之原因詳細分析，更進以將各種紡織產品之品質與實用性，其應具備之水準作深入之探討。
description.en: Textile goods are made through a long process. Product of all process must be testing and inspection , that can make sure to have a good quality . So it has attained an importment position in the textile industry. It involves scope, apparatus, procedure. standard or specification and results. Testing and inspection are carried out in order to answer one or more questions. Are the goods satisfactory? Are the goods better or poorer than another lot? What has been the effect of a certain process on the goods? If the goods are unsatisfactory or unusual ,what is the cause of the abnormality. After analyzing these causes and results to get more research and appreciation of product's quality, activity and standard level.

description.zh: 分別就纖維、紗線、織物、成衣，檢驗應具備之特性，並比較各種不同之檢驗方法所得之檢驗結果。學習各種儀器之正確操作方法，及對檢驗結果代表性之判定。
description.en: Textile testing can include the means for determining the properties of a fiber, a yarn, and an apparel.  The data obtained here can be analyzed statistically.  Procedures and operation of testing insturment operations are the most important issue.

description.zh: 本課程的目的是讓學生對於織造工程的原理、流程能充分瞭解與認識。其內容包括絡筒、整經、漿紗等準備工程及梭織、針織等製布工程。涵蓋力織機的主要、次要機構、無梭織機、紗環成形元件、緯編針織與經編針織。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to make students fully understand the theory and process of weaving engineering.  In addition to the winding, warping and slashing processes for the yarn preparation, the syllabus contains the weaving and knitting methods for the fabric construction.  The primary and secondary mechanisms in a power loom, shuttleless looms, loop-forming elements, weft knitting and warp knitting are all mentioned in details.

description.zh: 本課程的目的是讓學生經由實際的操作，以致對織造工程的原理能有更深入的認識。其內容包括：系內實習工廠筒子機、整經機、漿紗機、劍杆式投緯織機、片梭織機、噴水式織機、圓編針織機、織襪機、經編針織機等機器的操作。又為了增進學生對於實務的瞭解，校外工廠參觀亦列入課程中。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to make students further understand the weaving theories through the practical operations.  The students have to learn the operation of the following machines at the workshop in this department.  They are cone winder, warping machine, sizing machine, rapier loom, gripper loom, water-jet loom, circular knitting machine, hosiery knitter and warp-knitting machine.  In order to enhance the students' understanding of weaving processes, the visits to some local weaving mills are also arranged.

description.zh: 學生了解絲線加工種類、特性，各種機械特性，最近我國絲線加工業之發展情況、加工絲之分類及其特性、傳統的加撚─熱定型─解撚加工絲之探討、假撚加工絲之構造，幾何學、假撚加工絲各種機械及其特性、影響假撚加工絲蓬鬆伸縮加工絲之因素、假撚加工絲之品管與檢驗。
description.en:
The growth and process of the textured continuous filament market in the last decade is one of the most spectacular and profitable ever witnessed by the textile industry in Taiwan. Among the subjects discussed in textured yarn technology are:
(1) The basic knowledge of texturing techniques.
(2) Textured yarn market and tyrends.
(3) The influence of texturing on fabric properties.
(4) False-twist-texturing processes.
(5) New components and techniques for false-twist texturing plants.
(6) Machinery development.
(7) Yarn quality and inspection.

description.zh: 學生了解絲線加工種類、特性，各種機械特性，最近我國絲線加工業所使用之最新設備，假撚加工絲之新生產條件的製造。影響假撚加工絲生產效率之因素、假撚加工絲之品管與檢驗。
description.en: The course provides students the practice of texturing processes.  Essentially the course gives students flexibility in choosing their own subject of study from the various cases available.  Students should submit server papers during the course.

description.zh:
紡織工業越來越越電腦化與自動化，現代紡織工廠管理課程內容如下：
﹝1﹞ 工廠企劃與系統統計。
﹝2﹞ 工廠企劃與管理上之探討：電腦化與自動化。
﹝3﹞ 工廠企劃與原料之搬運。
﹝4﹞ 電腦輔助設計﹝CDA﹞與電腦輔助製造﹝CAM﹞。
﹝5﹞ 線上與線外之製程管理。
﹝6﹞ 檢查與品質管理。
﹝7﹞ 工業安全之組織與方案。
﹝8﹞ 模擬與成本分析。
description.en:
As the textile world becomes more and "computerized and automated," the study of textile factory management provides an understanding of various issues in the modern factory where textile products are manufactured. The whole spectrum of factory management issues are as the follows:

﹝1﹞ Factory planning and system design.
﹝2﹞ Factory planning and management considerations: computerization and automation.
﹝3﹞ Factory planning and materials handling.
﹝4﹞ Computer-aided design﹝CDA﹞and computer-aided manufacturing﹝CAM﹞.
﹝5﹞ On-line and off-line process control.
﹝6﹞ Inspection and quality control.
﹝7﹞ Industrial safety: need for organizing and planning the program.
﹝8﹞ Simulation and cost analysis.

description.zh: 染料發色理論，染料類別與性質，染料中間體，偶氮染料之製備以及分散、反應、直接等染料之結構與性質之介紹與說明。
description.en: It covers the chromophores, Colour Index intermediates and properties of different kinds of dyes.  The details of preparation of azo dyes,disperse dyes and reactive dyes are also described.

description.zh: 使學生瞭解人造纖維之合成方法，逐步聚合及連鎖聚合在高分子纖維上之理論研討。共聚合理論在人造纖維上之應用。人造纖維之結構物性基本理論研討。各種人造纖維及天然纖維之研究包括：嫘縈、亞克力纖維、聚酯、耐龍、彈性纖維、聚烯烴、超細纖維、液晶纖維、棉、羊毛、醋酸纖維。
description.en:
The aim of this course is to understand the synthetic method of man-made fibers.  The theoretical foundation of step growth and chain growth mechanism of polymer fiber are elucidated.  Copolymerization theory in fiber application are discussed also.
Finally, the structure-properties relationship in fiber science and fiber chemistry will be discussed.  These fibers include Rayon, Acrylics, polyester, nylon, spandex, polyolefin, superfine fiber, liquid crystal polymer, cotton, wool, and acetic fiber.

description.zh: 係利用物理機械整理及化學處理方式，改善紡織品之吸引性、服務性和最終用途之機能性。整理加工技術包括結構穩定性(諸如壓縮、煮呢、蒸呢、熱定型)；表面特性改質(諸如平滑性、粗糙性、光澤性及其他美觀性質)與功能性改質(諸如防縐、防縮、防火、防污、防水、防微生物與昆蟲、耐光、耐冷熱、耐污染質及化學藥劑、耐氣候、耐摩擦、抗起球、抗靜電)。
description.en: The attractiveness, serriceability and end-use performance of textiles are imporved by the application of physical mechanical and chemical processes.  Finishing techniques include dismensional stabilization(such as, sanforization, crabbing, decatizing, heat-setting),modification of surface characteristics(such as, smoothness, roughness, luster, other esthetic fbric qualities) and functional property modification (such as, resistance to wrinkle shrinkage, fire, soils and stains, water, microorganisms and insect, light, heat and cold, air pollutants and chemical agents, weathering, abrasion, pilling and static change).

description.zh: 介紹各類紡織纖維之染色理論與基本染色方法；包括染料應用上之分類與紡織物纖維的類別，一般染色之理論，染色機械之類別，纖維素纖維、蛋白質纖維、聚酯纖維、聚醯胺纖維、聚丙烯睛纖維及其混紡織物的染色原理及應用以及各種纖維染色缺點以及防止與修正缺點之方法。
description.en: Introducing the dyeing theory and dyeing method of various textile fibers; which include the classification of dyestuffs and textile fibers, the dyeing machine, the dyeing theory and dyeing methods of cellulosic fibers, protein fibers, synthetic fibers and their blends, also the cause and correction of dyeing defects.

description.zh: 實際操作各種纖維的染色與各染色機械之應用，其包括標準液之配製及染料溶解之判定，棉及其混紡織物、羊毛及其混紡織物、蠶絲織物、聚酯纖維、尼龍織物、亞克力織物等的染色方法。
description.en: Practising the dyeing method and dyeing machine opertion and application on different forms of fiber; which include standard dyeing solution preparation, the dyeing of cotton, wool, silk, polyester, nylon, acrylic fibers and their blends.

description.zh: 織物整理實習之目的是瞭解和探討各種藥劑實際應用於織物上之效應。實習項目包括棉織物的樹脂、防燃、防污、撥水、撥油、防黴、衛生加工，聚酯織物的熱定性、鹼處理加工，羊毛織物的縮絨及防縮加工。
description.en: The object of textile finishing practice is to understand and discuss the effects of various chemicals applied on the fabrics.  The lab includes resin, flame-resistant, soil-resistant, water-and oil-repellent, rot proofing and hygienic finishes of cotton fabric, heat-setting and alkali treatment of polyester fabric, milling and shrink-resistant finishes of wool fabric.

description.zh: 依纖維素材別及各個纖維的物理、化學的特異性，論述染整的前處理工程／精練與漂白。包括棉織物的絲光工程；蛋白系纖維羊毛織物的防縮處理；合成纖維的預熱定型，鹼減量加工等。且配合目前染整工程省能源，省力化，節水系統的加工技術的趨勢，講述合理化系統工程的應用。
description.en: Depending on the unique properties of different fibers, the pretreatment processes-scouring and bleaching are described.  The mercerization of cotton fabric; chlorization of wool; and presetting.  Weight reduction of synthetic fiber are also included.  In association with the trend of energy save, labour save and water save system for dyeing and finishing technology, the application of process optimization are introduced.

description.zh: 依各個纖維的理化性，實際習得各種素材的精練，漂白染前處理工程。並對纖維素材的滲透性，雜質去除的功能性（化學藥劑、界面活性劑），織物的白度，纖維物性的影響加以討論。此外與練漂相關的燒毛、退漿，及合成纖維素材的熱定型，鹼減量加工實習的工程條件，效果並加以探討。
description.en: According to the chemical and physical properties of all kinds of fiber, their scouring and bleaching processes before dyeing are practically studied.  The wettibility tests,the  impurity removement of cellulose fiber,the whiteness of fabric and the influence of fiber physics are discussed.  Furthermore, the treatment conditions and effects for relevant processes such as singeing, disizing, presetting for synthetic fiber and weight reduction by alkali are generally discussed.

description.zh: 新纖維為目前日本纖維界之新興之學門，主要目的，在提昇傳統人纖的附加價值，及開創天然纖維所不及的一些新領域。本課程將包括(1)仿蠶絲素材(2)仿桃皮素材(3)仿皮革素材(4)仿羊毛素材(5)保溫性素材(6)吸濕、吸水性素材(7)透濕防水性素材(8)導電性纖維(9)變色性纖維(10)蓄熱性纖維(11)遮斷電磁波纖維(12)抗菌、防臭纖維(13)抗毛球性纖維(14)伸縮性纖維(15)耐燃性纖維。
description.en:
New generation of fiber is a popular topic in Japan.  The main objective is to enhance the added value of fiber materials.  Also, to make some special fibers which have unique properties compared to natural fibers.  The main topics inculde:
(1) Artificial silk
(2) Peach skin
(3) Artificial skin
(4) Artificial wool
(5) Insulating fibers
(6) Water absorptive fibers
(7) Water proof materials
(8) Conductive fibers
(9) Color changeable fibers
(10) Heat absorptive fibers
(11) Electric & Magnetic field insulating fibers [EMI]
(12) Antimicrobial fibers
(13) Antipilling fibers
(14) Spandex(elastmer fibers)
(15) Flame retardant fibers

description.zh: 同學們已瞭解紡紗概論之基礎理論，可進一步學習棉系紡紗、毛系紡紗、複合式紡紗及花式紡紗之專門理論及其紡紗技術。並包括革新式紡紗技術、最新1995年代各種紡紗製程機械之特殊功能及最新自動化設備機能、國外（美、日）紡紗工廠之技術與管理理念。最後講述世界新銳紡紗品質檢驗儀器之原理及功能、電子自動監控儀器及品質瑕疵追蹤改善。
description.en: After understanding the basic theory of spinning ,this class will gives a farther  learning in specialized spinning theory  and technics of  short staple spinning,long staple spinning,multiple spinning ,and fancy spinning. It contains the innovative technics of spinning, the special function of  each most new spinning processing mechanics and automatic equipment in 1995,the concept of techincs and management of spinning factory in U.S.A. and Japan.In the end, the theroy and function of the most mordern quality testing equipment for spinning and automatic electornic control instrument, and the quality improvement for tracing flaw will be mentioned.

description.zh: 講述機械設計的基本原則以及紡織機械的種類、類型與演變，並由紡織工業的發展趨勢預測紡織機械未來的發展方向。
description.en: This course introduces students the fundamental principles of machine design, history and variation of textile machinery.  The trend of textile machinery development to cope with the development of textile industries is also mentioned.

description.zh:
本學科在探討電漿處理的基本原理及相關之應用，內容包括：
1. 電漿技術在高分子合成上之應用簡介。
2. 電漿技術基本控制參數﹝低溫低壓，或低溫常壓等﹞。
3. 氣相反應之動力學。
4. 氣體游離技術。
5. 濺散蝕刻﹝Sputter Etching﹞之技術。
6. 電漿技術對薄膜及界面黏著之應用。
7. 電漿技術對織物表面之應用。
8. 電漿處理後之表面鑑定學。
description.en:
This course includes the following topics
1. Plasma for Polymerization. 
2. Operational Parameters of Plasma Polymerization.
3. Gas-Phase Reactions.
4. Ionized Gas.
5. Plasma for etching﹝Sputter Etching﹞.
6. Plasma for thin film and interfacial adhesion.
7. Plasma for textile application.
8. General Characteristics of Polymers.

description.zh: 紡織表面科學和表面性質，利用掃瞄電子顯微鏡和原子力顯微鏡等分析紡織表面結構；表面接觸角測量；表面靜電荷測量；電子光譜分析儀分析纖維表面化學元素；芙莉葉轉換紅外光譜儀和聲波芙莉葉轉換紅外光譜儀等分析表面元素組成。
description.en: Textile surface sciences and surface properties; Characterization of textile surface physical properties using Scanning Electron Microscopy(SEM); Atomic Force Microscopy(AFM), contact angle and surface charge potential measurements; Surface chemical properties by Electron Spectroscopy for Chemical Analysis(ESCA); Fouier Transform InfraRed spectroscopy(FTIR), photoacoustic FTIR and Auger lines.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh:
一學期兩學分兩小時，共三學期六學分。每學期開授七門課，學生可從中任選一門修讀。不得重複修讀同一課程。三學期共需修畢三個不同的課目。每班選修以四十二人為限。內容包含：禮記、論語、先秦諸子選讀、朱熹學術思想、傳習錄、史記選讀、世說新語的人物、先秦寓言、詩經、駢文選讀、李杜詩、蘇東坡詩欣賞、孟子、荀子、現代詩、蘇辛詞、莊子、韓非子、六祖壇經、左傳、陶淵明及其作品、唐近體詩選讀、李商隱詩、山海經、唐宋元民間文學、志怪小說選讀、菜根譚與幽夢影、書法名作選讀。禮記－中國古代禮制文明(Ａ)
論語(Ｂ)先秦諸子選讀(Ｃ)朱熹學術思想(Ｄ)傳習錄()史記選讀
description.en: For this course, there will be 2 credits for each of three semesters.  Students are required to choose one from the seven subjects offered in each semester.  Selective readings included Book of Rites, Analects of Confucius, and Pre-Chin Works.

description.zh: 本課程以與學生日常生活相關的情境為主題，協助學生建立自然、流利的英語溝通技巧。語程側重訓練學生下列語言能力；(1)重音、縮音、連音、及語調等發音基礎訓練；(2)聆聽大意及特定資訊之能力；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式。本課程使用語言教室視聽器材實施教學。除聆聽錄音教材、配對練習、角色扮演、演說、表演短劇、及小組討論外，並佐以錄影教材，以加強實際演練與師生互動。
description.en:
This training is designated to help students establish
communicative skills through natural and authentic English,
contextualized in lively, interesting situations related to
students' immediate needs. Special focuses will be on
(1) listening for main ideas and for specific information;
(2) pronunciation exercises targeted at important features
of English, such as stress, rhythm, intonation, reduction,
and linking sounds; (3) conversational fluency providing
students with a wide range of useful conversational
expressions.  Classes will be conducted in the language labs,and students will be expected to participate in class
discussions, oral drills after listening to tapes and watching videos.  Lots of interaction with other students either in pairs or in small or large group activities will be emphasized.

description.zh: 本課程承續學生一年級的英文基礎，提供學生更多閱讀機會，並加強閱讀策略指導，以培養學生獨立閱讀、及使用適當英文表達之能力。教材以介紹英語地區文化、思想、及價值觀為主，以協助學生建立世界觀，並培養其批判思考能力。教學活動以團體討論、小組討論、段落與短文習作實施。
description.en: The objective of this course are: (1)to provide the students with abundant reading opportunities based on the students' levels;(2)to introduce various reading strategies to the students so that they may find the optimal strategies to help themselves read independently; and (3)to furnish students with competence in writing. Reading selections will be mainly focused on discussion of the cultures, thoughts and values of the English-speaking world. Students will be able to join activities which encompasses group discussion, small group discussion, paragraph writing and essay writing.

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh:
大二上學期為軍訓（三）兩學分選修，在下列三單元中選擇兩者，概述如下：孫子兵法－－使學生了解我國固有兵學思想、戰爭原理、原則及戰爭指導藝術，啟發學生對兵學研究之興趣，增進軍事修養，建立全民國防共識，以維護國家安全。國防科技－－使學生對武器及武器系統與目前世界各國所發展使用的新式武器能作有系統的認識，並對我國獨立自主的國防科技發展成就有所了解，以啟發青年學生參與國防科技研究的興趣。護理與健康－－概述同大一女生部份。
國防科技－－使學生對武器及武器系統與目前世界各國所發展使用的新式武器能作有系統的認識，並對我國獨立自主的國防科技發展成就有所了解，以啟發青年學生參與國防科技研究的興趣。
護理與健康－－概述同大一女生部份。
description.en: Military Training includes three Courses at the first semester of second year. They are Sun Tzu's Art of War, National Defense Technology, Nursing and Health. Sophomores can choice any two of tem. Sun Tzu's Art of War introduces you into new area of thought of war. National Defense Technology affords you a thorough and systematic knowledge of world's high technology weapons. Nursing and Health is a course of teaching you how to take cares your own body and mind.

description.zh: 介紹一階常微分方程式，線性常微分方程式，及解非均勻方程式的一般方法，以及Bessel與 Strum Liouville 問題,並介紹 Laplace轉換與數值分析。
description.en: This course introduces students of engineering, physics, and mathematics to those areas of mathematics which are most important in connection with practical problems.  The contents are Ordinary Differential Equations, Linear Algebra, Fourier Analysis, and Numerical Methods.

description.zh: 本課程旨在教導學生具備獨立思考有機化學的能力;因此課程分為基本觀念(結構式與鍵結),有機化學反應與反應機構以及化合物的製備與分析等三大部分。
description.en: The aim of this course is to educate students to think independently about organic chemistry. The course is divided into three parts;introductory material(concepts of structure and bonding);organic reactions and mechanism(sigma-bond chemistry followed by  pi-bond chemistry);and topics of more specialized interest.

description.zh: 本課程主要簡介紡織科技所包含之原料,製程,製品和評估，同時訓練學生了解基本的紡織辭彙。
description.en: Textile materials and related processes are introduced, and technical used  are learned as well.

description.zh: 使學生對工程力學原理之理論與應用具有清晰、完整的概念。內容涵蓋：基本觀念，力系的平衡、摩擦、慣性矩和慣性積，質點的運動學與動力學，應力和應變，扭矩、彎力矩、樑的撓曲。
description.en: The Purpose of this course is to provide the student with a clear and thorough presention of the theory and application of engineering mechanics.  The text contains general principles, equilibrium of force system, friction, moments of inertia, kinetics and dynamics of a particle, stress and strain, torsion, bending moment and bending of beam.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹一系列的生物大分子及構成這些生物分子的基本分子。課程從認識細菌、植物、動物細胞及各種細胞胞器開始，接著探討蛋白質、酵素、DNA、RNA、脂質、糖類結構和功能及他們在生命中的重要性。構成蛋白質的二十種氨基酸和組成DNA或RNA的四個核甘酸及構成脂質、糖類結構的生物分子將詳細被探討。
description.en: This course is to introduce a serials of biomaterials and their functions. Begins from bacterial, plant, and animal cells and the differences between these cell organs. To learn of DNA, RNA, proteins, and enzymes base on their structures and functions. The characters of 20 amino acids and 4 nucleotides will be studied in detail. Carbohydrates and lipids are learned by their specific functions.

description.zh: 本課程包含高分子材料的結構鑑定和材料的性質分析。材料的結構鑑定方法有：元素分析、吸收光譜法、振動光譜法、核磁共振光譜法、質譜法、x-射線光譜法和電子顯微鏡法。材料的性質分析包含：材料熱性質(DSC, TGA, TMA,DMA)和材料機械性質(伸張、壓縮、剪力強度等)。
description.en: This course includes structure identification and property analysis of polymer materials.  Methods of structure identification of materials are: elemental analysis, absorption spectroscopy, vibration spectroscopy, nuclear magnetic resonance spectroscopy, mass spectrometry, x-ray spectroscopy and electron microscopy.  Metheds of property analysis of materials are: thermal properties of materials (DSC,TGA,TMA,DMA) and mechanical properties of materials (tensile, compression and shear strength).

description.zh: 本課程係講述纖維材料領域中常用之電機學，其包括有電與磁之基本概念、直流與交流基本電路、電化學效應、三相與單相感應電動機、伺服馬達、步進馬達之基本原理及控制電路等。
description.en: This course introduces students the fundamental principles of the electrical engineering in textile related materials field, which include the basic concept of the electricity and magnetism, basic control circuit of the direct and alternative circuits, electrochemistry, basic theory of the 3-phase and single phase inductance motor, servo motor and stepping motor, and their control circuits etc.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本軍訓課程分四學期，大一上學期為軍訓（一）零學分，概述如下：戰爭概論－－使學生了解戰爭的涵義與指導要領，藉以體認「好戰必亡，忘戰必危」的真義，以樹立國防共識，維護國家安全，並增進對國家生存、民族發展的必勝信念。陸軍概要－－使學生了解我國陸軍之沿革、使命、特性、組織體系、教育訓練、情報、作戰、後勤及未來發展，增進對陸軍之認識。
description.en: The military training courses comprise four semesters. During the first semester, there are two subjects which are the War Conception and the Introduction of Army. The War Conception is designed to make student understand the definition of War and the guidelines of the War. By knowing the War, we can realize that the bellicose must lead to destruction, while the ignorant lead to risk, and build the consensus that the National Defense and security is crucial to National survival and development. The introduction of Army is designed to make student understand the army's history, task, character, origination, intelligence, operation, logistics and the future development.

description.zh: 孫中山先生創立中華民國之立國精神在於三民主義之自由平等、民主、均富，此精神也就是依據的原則。本課程以中華民國憲法為經，　國父建國之理想步驟為緯，俾使學生充分瞭解我國之立國精神所在，並認識我國憲法的精神及內涵，培養學生維護憲法之尊嚴，以及愛國家愛民族之情操。
description.en: The Republic of China is established by Dr. Sun Yat-sen on the basis of Equality, Democracy, and Equated Distribution of Wealth, which are also the principles in San-Ming-Zhu-Yi (literally, Three Principles of the People). This course is made up of two focuses: the Constitution of the Republic of China and the ideal approaches which lead to the establishment of the very nation to the purpose that the students would realize the constitutional spirit and the underlying meaning, so as to cultivate a patriotic love for the country and its people.

description.zh:
一學期兩學分兩小時，共三學期六學分。每學期開授七門課，學生可從中任選一門修讀。不得重複修讀同一課程。三學期共需修畢三個不同的課目。每班選修以四十二人為限。內容包含：禮記、論語、先秦諸子選讀、朱熹學術思想、傳習錄、史記選讀、世說新語的人物、先秦寓言、詩經、駢文選讀、李杜詩、蘇東坡詩欣賞、孟子、荀子、現代詩、蘇辛詞、莊子、韓非子、六祖壇經、左傳、陶淵明及其作品、唐近體詩選讀、李商隱詩、山海經、唐宋元民間文學、志怪小說選讀、菜根譚與幽夢影、書法名作選讀。禮記－中國古代禮制文明(Ａ)
論語(Ｂ)先秦諸子選讀(Ｃ)朱熹學術思想(Ｄ)傳習錄()史記選讀
description.en: For this course, there will be 2 credits for each of three semesters.  Students are required to choose one from the seven subjects offered in each semester.  Selective readings included Book of Rites, Analects of Confucius, and Pre-Chin Works.

description.zh: 本課程設計重點有三：(1)藉由精選的中級程度教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
description.en: This course is designed (1) to strengthen students' previously required knowledge in English with basic grammatical ideas and sentence patterns reviewed through selected materials at intermediate level; (2) to get the most (gist) out of the reading and appreciate the writing strategy of diverse interests. Focuses will be on explanation of difficult words, phrases, and syntax, as well as on analysis of fostering a basic writing skill; (3) to reinforce the competence and performance of listening, speaking, reading and writing by practice.

description.zh: 本課程以與學生日常生活相關的情境為主題，協助學生建立自然、流利的英語溝通技巧。語程側重訓練學生下列語言能力；(1)重音、縮音、連音、及語調等發音基礎訓練；(2)聆聽大意及特定資訊之能力；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式。本課程使用語言教室視聽器材實施教學。除聆聽錄音教材、配對練習、角色扮演、演說、表演短劇、及小組討論外，並佐以錄影教材，以加強實際演練與師生互動。
description.en:
This training is designated to help students establish
communicative skills through natural and authentic English,
contextualized in lively, interesting situations related to
students' immediate needs. Special focuses will be on
(1) listening for main ideas and for specific information;
(2) pronunciation exercises targeted at important features
of English, such as stress, rhythm, intonation, reduction,
and linking sounds; (3) conversational fluency providing
students with a wide range of useful conversational
expressions.  Classes will be conducted in the language labs,and students will be expected to participate in class
discussions, oral drills after listening to tapes and watching videos.  Lots of interaction with other students either in pairs or in small or large group activities will be emphasized.

description.zh: 本課程的設計以歷史趨勢的闡述及專題研究分析二方面同時進行。內容包括民族、社會、文化精神，中國歷代政治得失之分析，中國農業經濟之特性，歷代考選、財賦、土地制度之變遷。授課方式以口頭講述為主，討論及書面報告為輔，期使學生除通盤瞭解中國歷史精神與特性外，並能具有獨立分析問題之能力。
description.en: This course is comprised of two parts: introduction to the development of the Chinese history and studies on special topics of Chinese history.  Major topics includes ethnical, social, and cultural problems; the advantages and disadvantages of the political policies of different dynasties; the characteristics of the agricultural economy in the history of China; the evolution of civil service examination systems, of financial structures, and of land policies.  Class activities include lectures and discussions.  Students are also expected to make oral and written reports so that they may have not only a comprehensive understanding of the essence of Chinese history, but also the ability of independent thinking and analysis.

description.zh: 本課程從物理的觀點談述分子材料。內容包括如下主題：1.	力學2.	電學3.	光學4.	磁學5.	生物物理
description.en: This course introduces molecular materials from physics point of view.It will cover the following topics：1. Mechanics 2. Electronics3. Photonics4. Magnetics5. Biophysics

description.zh: 操作與分子物理相關的實驗
description.en: It covers the fundamental experiments in molecular physics.

description.zh: 本課程從分子化學的觀點談述分子材料。其中包括原子結構及分子結構，基礎高分子化學，生物化學。
description.en: This course introduces molecular materials from chemistry point of view.  It covers the following topics: structures of atoms and molecules, polymer molecules, and biochemistry.

description.zh: 操作化學相關的實驗
description.en: It covers the fundamental experiments in chemistry.

description.zh: 本課程的教學目的在於期望同學能具備相當的製圖與識圖的能力，其內容包含基本圖學概念、傳統正投影圖學及基本機械製圖概念。
description.en: The object of this course is to make students capable of making and understanding the engineering drawing. The contents of text are Fundamental drawing concepts, systems of projection, views on drawings, sections and sectional views, conventional representations, principles of dimensioning, methods of dimensioning common features.

description.zh: 本課程主要說明各種紡織材料之組成,基本性質,成形,各種加工與應用。
description.en: Introduction to textile compositions, properties, spinning, processings and applications.

description.zh: 國內半導體資訊、自動化、化學、精密工業等與日本關係非常密切。日本為世界第二大經濟大國，日文方面科技資料甚多，如能培養學生閱讀科技日文資料，對國內未來科技與工業之發展有莫大助益。本課程內容在於如何收集與閱讀日文方面科技資料，學習時分兩段，基礎篇與應用篇。
description.en: This course has been designed to provide students essential Japanese language ability for reading technical information. The course covers: (1)Basic Japanese grammar (2)Japanese technical phrase(3)Technical terminology: semiconductor, information technology, automation, biotechnolpgy, and polymer chemistry.

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技四年級上學期實施選修專項分組教學，課程修畢有一學分並計入畢業學分內。由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: In first semester, Senior students can choose to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. When they are finishing the course that can get the credit, also can account in graduate credit.  For Senior level, Classes are giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本課程由學生與老師共同選定題目，在特定題目下對此專題之問題定義，分析，推理，設計，製作與解決方法進行研究，以完成該專題之成品，專題完成後需撰寫書面報告並公開展示成品，以培養實務工作之能力。專題範圍包含：1.電子電路，2.電子儀表，3.控制與通訊系統，4.電子視聽系統，5.微電腦為基礎之計算機硬體（含軟體）製作，6.軟體設計與製作（PC，工作站），影像處理與計算機視覺，多媒體製作（動畫、Video、Audio及其整合），9.其他。
description.en: In this course,students will conduct special project under the guidance of his advisor.The topic of this project,selected and decided by bath the student and his advisor,could be chosen form(but not limited to) 1.Electronic circuits 2.Electronic instrumentation 3.Communication and control systems 4.Microprocessor applications 5.Multimedia system designs 6.Computer networks 7.Computer software desgin.

description.zh: 在本課程中,我們將邀請產,官,學,研界人士,對電子,電機,電腦,通訊等相關議題,作深入而精闢之演講
description.en: In this course,we will intive outstanding professional persons to address lectures on various technical fields covering electronics,electicity,computer ,communication etc.

description.zh:
1.電腦網路概述
2.階層結構
3.路由與交換
4.流量與擁塞控制
5.媒體存取控制
6.區域網路協定與標準
７．網路互連
８．效能評估
description.en:
1.Introduction to Computer Network
2.Layered Structure
3.Routing and Switching 
4.Flow and Congestion Control
5.Medium Access Control 
6.Local Area Network Protocols and Standards
7.Network Interconnection
8.Performance Analysis

description.zh: (A) 部分：1.基本CMOS邏輯閘設計，2.CMOS基本邏輯閘時序模擬，3.CMOS基本邏輯閘佈局，4.數位電路功能分析與模擬，5.階層式的電路組成，6.中小型電路設計，7.VHDL系統，(B) 部分：1.認識Cadence系統， 2.圖形編輯設備的操作練習，3.零件庫介紹，4.設計電路之輸入編輯，5.電路模擬實習，6.數位電路的晶片設計，7.晶片製造專題。
description.en:
(A)
1.Basic CMOS logic design
2.CMOS logic gate simulation 
3.CMOS logic gate placement
4.Analysis and simulation of digital circuit 
5.Hierachy circuit
6.VHDL system
(B)
1.Introduction to c cadence system
2.Graphic editor practice
3.module
4.Input editor 
5.Circuit simulation practice
6.Special projects

Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。

The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh: 對電路系統之特性加以廣泛的探討，使學生具備電子電路之廣度與深度瞭解，內容有：1.頻率響應分析，2.回授放大器，3.電路之穩定性分析，4.運算放大器，5.波形之合成與整形電路，6.濾波器，7.功率放大器。
description.en:
1.Frequency response 
2.Feedback amplifier
3.Stability analysis
4.Operational amplifier
5.Waveform generators and shaping 
6.Filter
7.Power amplifier

description.zh:
內容包函：
(1)串級放大電路; (2)場效電晶體之特性; (3)場效電晶體放大電路; (4)運算放大器應用電路(反相放大器、非反相放大器、加法器、減法器、對數放大器、積分器、微分器、比較器); (5)基本振盪電路(RC振盪電路、韋恩電橋振盪電路、石英晶體振盪電路、無穩態多諧振盪電路、單穩態多諧振盪電路、雙穩態多諧振盪電路、施密特觸發器、方波產生電路、三角波產生電路); (6)高頻電路、低頻電路之嚮應; (7)回授放大器; (8)放大器之穩定性實驗; (9)振盪器設計; (10)主動濾波器; (11)功率電路。
description.en: 1.Response of low-frequency circuits 2.Response of high-frequency circuits 3.Feedback amplifier 4.Stability of amplifier 5.Design of oscillator 6.Operational amplifier 7.Active filter 8.Power amplifier circuit

description.zh:
1. 訊號時域與須域特性的量測  7.  類比訊號的取樣與重整
2. 比式濾波器的設計          8.  脈幅調變系統
3. 雙旁波帶AM調變系統        9.  脈碼調變系統
4. 單旁波帶AM調變系統        10. 數位通頻傳輸
5. FM調變系統與解調          11. 訊號多工的傳送與接收
6. 鎖相迴路檢波器的設計      12. 通訊系統的設計與模擬
description.en:
The lab course is designed for supplementing the lecture course'Communication Systems' and 'Digital Communication Systems'.sStudents can learn the principles and practive of analog and digital communication systems from laboratory experiments and projects.The cintents include
1.measuremnts of signals in time domain and frequency domain 
2.design of analog filters
3.double sideband AM systems
4.single sideband AM systems
5.FM systems
6.dessign of phase-locked-loop detectors
7.sampling and regeneration of analog signals
8.pulse amplitude modulation(PAM)systems
9.pulse coded modulation(PCM)systems
10.digital passband transmission
11.multiplexing systems
12.design and simulation of communication systems

description.zh:
使學生熟悉，應用程式設計之環境、方法、及原則，內容含：
（１）作業系統與應用程式之關係
（２）視窗環境
（３）網路環境
（４）整合設計
學生將窗撰寫完整之應用程式
description.en:
To familiarize the student with the environments,
methodologies,and principles of application software
design.
Topics include :
1.Run-time environments
2.Window environments
3.Networking environments
4.Integrated design
The student will write application programs with actual function.

description.zh: 瞭解常見之演算法及其分析，1.Complexity、Big-Oh符號，2.演算法之分析，3.集合、優先佇列，4.樹、平衡樹，5.排序演算法，6.搜尋演算法，7.圖形演算法，8.幾何演算法，9.NP-complete problems之理論及對策。
description.en:
1.Complexity 
2.Analysis of algorithms
3.Set,priorty queue
4.Tree,Balanced tree
5.Sorting algorithms
6.Search algorithms
7.Graph algorithms
8.Geometry algorithms
9.NP-complete problems

description.zh:
1.複數
2.複函數 
3.諧和函數
4.複數積分
5.柯西積分理論
6.複冪級數
7.洛冉級數,餘數
8.保角寫像
description.en:
1.Complex Numbers
2.Complex Functions
3.Harmonic Functions
4.Complex Integration
5.Cauchy Theory of Integration 
6.Complex Power Series
7.Laurent Series,Residues
8.Conformal Mapping

description.zh:
本科目介紹各種軟體系統之設計及實作觀念。主要之課程包括有：
1.系統軟體概念與電腦結構
2.組譯器基本概念
3.組譯器之設計與實作
4.載入器與連結器之基本概念
5.載入器與連結器之設計與實作
6.巨集處理器之基本概念
7.巨集處理器之設計與實作
8.編譯器之基本功能
9.編譯器之設計理與實作
10.其他系統軟體之介紹。
description.en:
This course is an introduction to the design and implementation of various types of system software.
The major topics covered in this course are :
1.System software and Machine structure
2.The concept of Assemblers
3.The implementation of Two-pass Assembler
4.The concept of Loaders and Linkers   
5.The implementation of Loaders and Linkers 
6.The concept of Macro Processor
7.The implementation of Macro Processor
8.The concept of compiler
9.The concept of Operating System
10.Other System Software

name.en: Analysis and Simulation of Integrated Circuits

description.zh:
本課程在訓練學生如何使用電腦輔助設計軟体來分析與模擬類比及數位積体電路,進而能培養學生具有設計積体電路的能力,課程內容包念：
1. 電腦輔助設計積体電路介紹
2. 類比積体電路設計軟体之介紹及使用 ( SPICE Design center )
3. 數位積体電路設計軟体之介紹及使用 ( Viewlogic )
4. PLD的認識與介紹
5. FPGA ( Xilinx )的設計
6. 專題設計
description.en:
This course is trained the student to use computer-aided design tools for the analysis and simulation of integrated 
circuits(digital & analysis) .Therefore,the student have the design capability of integrated.The contents of this 
course :
1.introduction to the Computer-aided IC design 
2.Introduction to the computer-aided deaign of analysis  
  integrated circuits(SPICE ,Deaign Center)and computer-
  exercise
3.Introduction to the computer-aided design of digital integrated circuits(Viewlogic)and computer-exercise
4.Introduction to the PLD
5.FPGA(XILINX)design and computer-exercise
6.Project.

description.zh:
1.輸入輸出工作：非同步匯流排(Asynchronous Bus)，仲裁設計(Arbitration)，同步匯流排(Synchronous Bus)，程式化I/O與直接記憶進出(Programmed I/O and DMA)，I/O通道與I/O處理器(I/O Channels and I/O Processors)，
2.平行處理(Parallel  Processing)：管線系統(Pipelined Processor)，運算管線(Arithmetic Pipeline)，指令管線(Instruction Pipeline)，矩陣處理器(Array Processor)，多處理器系統(MIMD)。
description.en:
1.I/O operations:Asynchronous bus,Aribitration,Synchronous bus,Programmed I/O and DMA, I/O channel and I/O processors
2.Parallel Processing :Piplined processor,Arithmetic pipline,Instruction pipline ,Array processor,MIMD

To make the students understand the basic concepts and applications of Electromafneties which includes :
1.Electromafnetic Model.
2.The Vector Analysis.
3.Static Electric Fields.
4.Electrostatic Problems`Solutions.
5.Steady Eletric Currents.
6. Steat Mafnetic Fields.
7.Time Varying Fields and Maxwells`Equations.
8.Plane Electromapnetic Waves.
9.Theory and Applications of Transmission Lines.
10.Wavef uide and Carity Resonators.
11.Antenna and Radiation Theory.

description.zh: 1. 傅利葉分析與訊號取樣，2. 離散時序系統之頻率響應與電路設計， 3. Infinite Impulse Response 數位濾波器設計：Bilinear 轉換式，Impulse-invariance 方式，Step-invariance 方式，高通、帶通、帶拒濾波器轉換式，4.Finite Impulse Response 數位濾波器設計：FourierSeries 方法，Window 方法，5. 離散與快速傅利葉轉換：DFT、FFT等演算法。
description.en:
1.Fourier analysis and signal sampling
2.Frequcy response of discrete time system
3.IIR digital filter design
4.FIR digital filter design
5.Discrete fourier transform
6.Fast fourier transform

description.zh: 1.光纖概論，2.光纖波導，3.光纖傳輸特特性，4.光纖與光纜，5.光纖連接，6.光源與檢光器，7.光纖系統，8.光纖量測，9.光纖應用與未來發展。
description.en:
1.Introduction 
2.Waveguide of optical fibers
3.Propagation in optical fibers
4.Optical fibers and opotical cable
5.Fiber connectors
6.Light sources and detectors
7.Optical fiber communication systems
8.Measurement of optical fiber communication systems
9.Applications

description.zh:
本課程探討現代通訊的基本原理，內容重點放在類比通訊的調變技巧與雜訊分析．課程大綱包括：
1.簡介
2.信號與系統
3.機率、隨機程序與雜訊
4.振幅調變：雙旁波帶、調幅、單旁波帶與殘旁波帶
5.角度調變：頻率調變與相位調變
6.脈波調變：脈幅調變、脈寬調變、脈位調變、脈碼調變與步差調變
7.數位通訊簡介
對於數位通訊有進一步興趣的同學可繼續選修『數位通訊系統』課程
description.en:
Fundamental principles of modern communication will be investigated in depth in this course, with emphasis on analog communications.Basic modulation techniques will be introduced with nosie analysis.Contents include
1.Introduction 
2.Signals and Systems
3.Probability ,Random Process,and Nosie
4.Amplitude Modulations:DSB,AM,SSB,and VSB
5.Angle Modulations:FMand PM
6.Pulse Modulations:PAM,PWM,PPM,PCM,and DM
7.Intorduction to Digital Communication 
Students who want to know more details sbout digital commmunication are encouraged to take the course Digital Communication Systems

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh: 對電路系統之特性加以廣泛的探討，使學生具備電子電路之廣度與深度瞭解，內容有：1.頻率響應分析，2.回授放大器，3.電路之穩定性分析，4.運算放大器，5.波形之合成與整形電路，6.濾波器，7.功率放大器。
description.en:
1.Frequency response 
2.Feedback amplifier
3.Stability analysis
4.Operational amplifier
5.Waveform generators and shaping 
6.Filter
7.Power amplifier

description.zh:
內容包函：
(1)串級放大電路; (2)場效電晶體之特性; (3)場效電晶體放大電路; (4)運算放大器應用電路(反相放大器、非反相放大器、加法器、減法器、對數放大器、積分器、微分器、比較器); (5)基本振盪電路(RC振盪電路、韋恩電橋振盪電路、石英晶體振盪電路、無穩態多諧振盪電路、單穩態多諧振盪電路、雙穩態多諧振盪電路、施密特觸發器、方波產生電路、三角波產生電路); (6)高頻電路、低頻電路之嚮應; (7)回授放大器; (8)放大器之穩定性實驗; (9)振盪器設計; (10)主動濾波器; (11)功率電路。
description.en: 1.Response of low-frequency circuits 2.Response of high-frequency circuits 3.Feedback amplifier 4.Stability of amplifier 5.Design of oscillator 6.Operational amplifier 7.Active filter 8.Power amplifier circuit

description.zh:
1. 訊號時域與須域特性的量測  7.  類比訊號的取樣與重整
2. 比式濾波器的設計          8.  脈幅調變系統
3. 雙旁波帶AM調變系統        9.  脈碼調變系統
4. 單旁波帶AM調變系統        10. 數位通頻傳輸
5. FM調變系統與解調          11. 訊號多工的傳送與接收
6. 鎖相迴路檢波器的設計      12. 通訊系統的設計與模擬
description.en:
The lab course is designed for supplementing the lecture course'Communication Systems' and 'Digital Communication Systems'.sStudents can learn the principles and practive of analog and digital communication systems from laboratory experiments and projects.The cintents include
1.measuremnts of signals in time domain and frequency domain 
2.design of analog filters
3.double sideband AM systems
4.single sideband AM systems
5.FM systems
6.dessign of phase-locked-loop detectors
7.sampling and regeneration of analog signals
8.pulse amplitude modulation(PAM)systems
9.pulse coded modulation(PCM)systems
10.digital passband transmission
11.multiplexing systems
12.design and simulation of communication systems

description.zh:
使學生熟悉，應用程式設計之環境、方法、及原則，內容含：
（１）作業系統與應用程式之關係
（２）視窗環境
（３）網路環境
（４）整合設計
學生將窗撰寫完整之應用程式
description.en:
To familiarize the student with the environments,
methodologies,and principles of application software
design.
Topics include :
1.Run-time environments
2.Window environments
3.Networking environments
4.Integrated design
The student will write application programs with actual function.

description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh:
一學期兩學分兩小時，共三學期六學分。每學期開授七門課，學生可從中任選一門修讀。不得重複修讀同一課程。三學期共需修畢三個不同的課目。每班選修以四十二人為限。內容包含：禮記、論語、先秦諸子選讀、朱熹學術思想、傳習錄、史記選讀、世說新語的人物、先秦寓言、詩經、駢文選讀、李杜詩、蘇東坡詩欣賞、孟子、荀子、現代詩、蘇辛詞、莊子、韓非子、六祖壇經、左傳、陶淵明及其作品、唐近體詩選讀、李商隱詩、山海經、唐宋元民間文學、志怪小說選讀、菜根譚與幽夢影、書法名作選讀。禮記－中國古代禮制文明(Ａ)
論語(Ｂ)先秦諸子選讀(Ｃ)朱熹學術思想(Ｄ)傳習錄()史記選讀
description.en: For this course, there will be 2 credits for each of three semesters.  Students are required to choose one from the seven subjects offered in each semester.  Selective readings included Book of Rites, Analects of Confucius, and Pre-Chin Works.

description.zh: 本課程以與學生日常生活相關的情境為主題，協助學生建立自然、流利的英語溝通技巧。語程側重訓練學生下列語言能力；(1)重音、縮音、連音、及語調等發音基礎訓練；(2)聆聽大意及特定資訊之能力；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式。本課程使用語言教室視聽器材實施教學。除聆聽錄音教材、配對練習、角色扮演、演說、表演短劇、及小組討論外，並佐以錄影教材，以加強實際演練與師生互動。
description.en:
This training is designated to help students establish
communicative skills through natural and authentic English,
contextualized in lively, interesting situations related to
students' immediate needs. Special focuses will be on
(1) listening for main ideas and for specific information;
(2) pronunciation exercises targeted at important features
of English, such as stress, rhythm, intonation, reduction,
and linking sounds; (3) conversational fluency providing
students with a wide range of useful conversational
expressions.  Classes will be conducted in the language labs,and students will be expected to participate in class
discussions, oral drills after listening to tapes and watching videos.  Lots of interaction with other students either in pairs or in small or large group activities will be emphasized.

description.zh: 本課程承續學生一年級的英文基礎，提供學生更多閱讀機會，並加強閱讀策略指導，以培養學生獨立閱讀、及使用適當英文表達之能力。教材以介紹英語地區文化、思想、及價值觀為主，以協助學生建立世界觀，並培養其批判思考能力。教學活動以團體討論、小組討論、段落與短文習作實施。
description.en: The objective of this course are: (1)to provide the students with abundant reading opportunities based on the students' levels;(2)to introduce various reading strategies to the students so that they may find the optimal strategies to help themselves read independently; and (3)to furnish students with competence in writing. Reading selections will be mainly focused on discussion of the cultures, thoughts and values of the English-speaking world. Students will be able to join activities which encompasses group discussion, small group discussion, paragraph writing and essay writing.

description.zh: 本課程的設計以歷史趨勢的闡述及專題研究分析二方面同時進行。內容包括民族、社會、文化精神，中國歷代政治得失之分析，中國農業經濟之特性，歷代考選、財賦、土地制度之變遷。授課方式以口頭講述為主，討論及書面報告為輔，期使學生除通盤瞭解中國歷史精神與特性外，並能具有獨立分析問題之能力。
description.en: This course is comprised of two parts: introduction to the development of the Chinese history and studies on special topics of Chinese history.  Major topics includes ethnical, social, and cultural problems; the advantages and disadvantages of the political policies of different dynasties; the characteristics of the agricultural economy in the history of China; the evolution of civil service examination systems, of financial structures, and of land policies.  Class activities include lectures and discussions.  Students are also expected to make oral and written reports so that they may have not only a comprehensive understanding of the essence of Chinese history, but also the ability of independent thinking and analysis.

description.zh:
大二上學期為軍訓（三）兩學分選修，在下列三單元中選擇兩者，概述如下：孫子兵法－－使學生了解我國固有兵學思想、戰爭原理、原則及戰爭指導藝術，啟發學生對兵學研究之興趣，增進軍事修養，建立全民國防共識，以維護國家安全。國防科技－－使學生對武器及武器系統與目前世界各國所發展使用的新式武器能作有系統的認識，並對我國獨立自主的國防科技發展成就有所了解，以啟發青年學生參與國防科技研究的興趣。護理與健康－－概述同大一女生部份。
國防科技－－使學生對武器及武器系統與目前世界各國所發展使用的新式武器能作有系統的認識，並對我國獨立自主的國防科技發展成就有所了解，以啟發青年學生參與國防科技研究的興趣。
護理與健康－－概述同大一女生部份。
description.en: Military Training includes three Courses at the first semester of second year. They are Sun Tzu's Art of War, National Defense Technology, Nursing and Health. Sophomores can choice any two of tem. Sun Tzu's Art of War introduces you into new area of thought of war. National Defense Technology affords you a thorough and systematic knowledge of world's high technology weapons. Nursing and Health is a course of teaching you how to take cares your own body and mind.

description.zh: 瞭解工程系統中常用數學之原理及應用，內容包含：1.常微分一階、二階及高階方程式之解法，2.拉普拉斯 (Laplace)變換及其在電路上之應用，3.向量分析及其在電磁學上之應用。
description.en:
1.Ordinary differential equations of the first order
2.Linear ordinary differential equations of the second order
3.Laplace transforms
4.Vector analysis and its application to electormagnetics

description.zh:
1. 瞭解電路元件之基本特性及其組合電路之分析方法，內容包含：
(1)電路元件：電壓及電流源，主動元件，
(2)電路特性：歐姆定律，柯希荷夫電壓與電流定律等，
(3)一階及二階電路：電路之微分方程描述及各種輸入信號之響應，
(4)穩態分析與頻率響應：分析電路之頻域，
(5)電腦輔助電路分析：如使用 SPICE 工具。
2. 瞭解線性與非線性電路的組成與分析法，內容包含：
(1)交流激勵電路：交流穩態分析，功率計算及相電路，
(2)三相電路：Ｙ與△型轉換及功率分析，
(3)變壓器電路：互感應及電壓電流的變換，
(4)頻率響應分析：極點與零點，轉移函數，
(5)Fourier 級數，轉換及應用，
(6)Laplace轉換及應用。
description.en:
The course covers the synthesis and analysis of bath linear and nonlinear circuits.Contents include:
1.Introduction to linear circuit analysis, 2. Resistive circuit, 3. Kirchhoff laws, 4. Thevenin and Norton theorem, 5. First and second order circuit, 6. Node and loop analysis, 7. Steady state response and analysis, 8. SPICE tool, 9.AC circuit :AC steady-state analysis, phasor analysis, 10. Three phase circuits, 11. Transformer circuits, 12. Frequency response, 13. Fourier series, Fourier transformation and application, 14. Laplace transformation and application.

name.zh: 微算機原理及應用實習

description.zh: 瞭解微算機之基本組織架構及應用，內容包含：1.PC之使用，2.微電腦學習機之使用，3.邏輯分析儀之使用，4.組合語言之設計與除錯，5.記憶體設計ROM/RAM，6.輸出入埠設計及程式控制，7.輸出入埠應用(鍵盤介面、LED顯示介面)，8.A/D、D/A介面設計，9.簡單PC介面卡設計(PIO及SIO)介面，單晶片之設計與應用。
description.en:
The experiment covers the basic architecture and application 
of microcomputer.The lab. work includes:
1.The usage of PC
2.The usage of microcomputer training machine
3.Logic analysis
4.The design and debug of assembly language
5.ROM/RAM design
6.I/O design and control 
7.A/D, D/A design
8.PC interfacing design
9.Single-chip microcomputer system design

description.zh: 瞭解微算機及介面設計之基本觀念與應用，內容包含：1.微算機概論，2.中央處理單元架構、程式規劃及記體模式，3.微算機指令集及定址模式，4.組合語言程式設計，5.硬體介面概論，6.記憶體介面(ROM及RAM)介面，7.輸出入介面、中斷處理及直接記憶體存取，8.微算機系統概述及發展系統簡介。
description.en:
1.Introduction to microcomputer
2.Central processor unit 
3.Microprogramming set
4.Assemblylanguage programming
5.Interfacing circuits
6.ROM/RAM interface
7.I/O operations
8.Interrupt and direct memory access

description.zh: 本課程將結合理論說明與示範實習，使同學對雷射基本原理及光電科技應用有一完整的認識，內容包括：1.光電工程概論，2.基礎光學，3.電射發光原理，4.雷射光的調製，5.光電科技應用概論。
description.en:
The course covers bath lectures and lab exercise
1.Introduction 
2.Fundamentals of optics
3.Laser principles
4.Electrooptic modulation of laser beams
5.Applications of electrooptic techniques

description.zh:
１.組合分析
２.機率理論
３.隨機變數
４.隨機變數函數
５.機率分佈
６.期望值性質
７.樣本分佈
８.假設檢定
９.線性迴歸分析
１０.變異數分析
description.en:
1.Combinatonal Analysis
2.Pribability Theory
3.Random Variables
4.Functions of Random variables
5.Probability Distribution 
6.Properties of Expectation  
7.Sampling Distribution 
8.Tests of Hypotheses
9.Linear Regression Analysis
10.Analysis of Variance

description.zh: 1. 程式語言類別介紹 2.物件導向與資料抽象化3.類別與方法 4.訊息﹐實例與初始化 5.繼承 6.靜態與動態繫結 7.多型性 8.發展環境及工具 9. C++ Java Smalltalk 簡介10.應用程式實例介紹
description.en:
1.Programming Language Paradigms  
2.Object-Orientation and Data Abstraction  
3.Classes and Methods 
4.Messages, Instances, and Initialization 
5.Inheritance  
6.Static and Dynamic Binding
7.Polymorphism  
8.Environment and Tools  
9.Introduction to C++, Java, and Smalltalk 
10.Case Study

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh:
一學期兩學分兩小時，共三學期六學分。每學期開授七門課，學生可從中任選一門修讀。不得重複修讀同一課程。三學期共需修畢三個不同的課目。每班選修以四十二人為限。內容包含：禮記、論語、先秦諸子選讀、朱熹學術思想、傳習錄、史記選讀、世說新語的人物、先秦寓言、詩經、駢文選讀、李杜詩、蘇東坡詩欣賞、孟子、荀子、現代詩、蘇辛詞、莊子、韓非子、六祖壇經、左傳、陶淵明及其作品、唐近體詩選讀、李商隱詩、山海經、唐宋元民間文學、志怪小說選讀、菜根譚與幽夢影、書法名作選讀。禮記－中國古代禮制文明(Ａ)
論語(Ｂ)先秦諸子選讀(Ｃ)朱熹學術思想(Ｄ)傳習錄()史記選讀
description.en: For this course, there will be 2 credits for each of three semesters.  Students are required to choose one from the seven subjects offered in each semester.  Selective readings included Book of Rites, Analects of Confucius, and Pre-Chin Works.

description.zh: 本課程以與學生日常生活相關的情境為主題，協助學生建立自然、流利的英語溝通技巧。語程側重訓練學生下列語言能力；(1)重音、縮音、連音、及語調等發音基礎訓練；(2)聆聽大意及特定資訊之能力；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式。本課程使用語言教室視聽器材實施教學。除聆聽錄音教材、配對練習、角色扮演、演說、表演短劇、及小組討論外，並佐以錄影教材，以加強實際演練與師生互動。
description.en:
This training is designated to help students establish
communicative skills through natural and authentic English,
contextualized in lively, interesting situations related to
students' immediate needs. Special focuses will be on
(1) listening for main ideas and for specific information;
(2) pronunciation exercises targeted at important features
of English, such as stress, rhythm, intonation, reduction,
and linking sounds; (3) conversational fluency providing
students with a wide range of useful conversational
expressions.  Classes will be conducted in the language labs,and students will be expected to participate in class
discussions, oral drills after listening to tapes and watching videos.  Lots of interaction with other students either in pairs or in small or large group activities will be emphasized.

description.zh: 本課程承續學生一年級的英文基礎，提供學生更多閱讀機會，並加強閱讀策略指導，以培養學生獨立閱讀、及使用適當英文表達之能力。教材以介紹英語地區文化、思想、及價值觀為主，以協助學生建立世界觀，並培養其批判思考能力。教學活動以團體討論、小組討論、段落與短文習作實施。

7.Sampling Distribution 
8.Tests of Hypotheses
9.Linear Regression Analysis
10.Analysis of Variance

description.zh: 1. 程式語言類別介紹 2.物件導向與資料抽象化3.類別與方法 4.訊息﹐實例與初始化 5.繼承 6.靜態與動態繫結 7.多型性 8.發展環境及工具 9. C++ Java Smalltalk 簡介10.應用程式實例介紹
description.en:
1.Programming Language Paradigms  
2.Object-Orientation and Data Abstraction  
3.Classes and Methods 
4.Messages, Instances, and Initialization 
5.Inheritance  
6.Static and Dynamic Binding
7.Polymorphism  
8.Environment and Tools  
9.Introduction to C++, Java, and Smalltalk 
10.Case Study

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本軍訓課程分四學期，大一上學期為軍訓（一）零學分，概述如下：戰爭概論－－使學生了解戰爭的涵義與指導要領，藉以體認「好戰必亡，忘戰必危」的真義，以樹立國防共識，維護國家安全，並增進對國家生存、民族發展的必勝信念。陸軍概要－－使學生了解我國陸軍之沿革、使命、特性、組織體系、教育訓練、情報、作戰、後勤及未來發展，增進對陸軍之認識。
description.en: The military training courses comprise four semesters. During the first semester, there are two subjects which are the War Conception and the Introduction of Army. The War Conception is designed to make student understand the definition of War and the guidelines of the War. By knowing the War, we can realize that the bellicose must lead to destruction, while the ignorant lead to risk, and build the consensus that the National Defense and security is crucial to National survival and development. The introduction of Army is designed to make student understand the army's history, task, character, origination, intelligence, operation, logistics and the future development.

description.zh: 孫中山先生創立中華民國之立國精神在於三民主義之自由平等、民主、均富，此精神也就是依據的原則。本課程以中華民國憲法為經，　國父建國之理想步驟為緯，俾使學生充分瞭解我國之立國精神所在，並認識我國憲法的精神及內涵，培養學生維護憲法之尊嚴，以及愛國家愛民族之情操。
description.en: The Republic of China is established by Dr. Sun Yat-sen on the basis of Equality, Democracy, and Equated Distribution of Wealth, which are also the principles in San-Ming-Zhu-Yi (literally, Three Principles of the People). This course is made up of two focuses: the Constitution of the Republic of China and the ideal approaches which lead to the establishment of the very nation to the purpose that the students would realize the constitutional spirit and the underlying meaning, so as to cultivate a patriotic love for the country and its people.

description.zh:
一學期兩學分兩小時，共三學期六學分。每學期開授七門課，學生可從中任選一門修讀。不得重複修讀同一課程。三學期共需修畢三個不同的課目。每班選修以四十二人為限。內容包含：禮記、論語、先秦諸子選讀、朱熹學術思想、傳習錄、史記選讀、世說新語的人物、先秦寓言、詩經、駢文選讀、李杜詩、蘇東坡詩欣賞、孟子、荀子、現代詩、蘇辛詞、莊子、韓非子、六祖壇經、左傳、陶淵明及其作品、唐近體詩選讀、李商隱詩、山海經、唐宋元民間文學、志怪小說選讀、菜根譚與幽夢影、書法名作選讀。禮記－中國古代禮制文明(Ａ)
論語(Ｂ)先秦諸子選讀(Ｃ)朱熹學術思想(Ｄ)傳習錄()史記選讀
description.en: For this course, there will be 2 credits for each of three semesters.  Students are required to choose one from the seven subjects offered in each semester.  Selective readings included Book of Rites, Analects of Confucius, and Pre-Chin Works.

description.zh: 本課程設計重點有三：(1)藉由精選的中級程度教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
description.en: This course is designed (1) to strengthen students' previously required knowledge in English with basic grammatical ideas and sentence patterns reviewed through selected materials at intermediate level; (2) to get the most (gist) out of the reading and appreciate the writing strategy of diverse interests. Focuses will be on explanation of difficult words, phrases, and syntax, as well as on analysis of fostering a basic writing skill; (3) to reinforce the competence and performance of listening, speaking, reading and writing by practice.

description.zh: 本課程以與學生日常生活相關的情境為主題，協助學生建立自然、流利的英語溝通技巧。語程側重訓練學生下列語言能力；(1)重音、縮音、連音、及語調等發音基礎訓練；(2)聆聽大意及特定資訊之能力；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式。本課程使用語言教室視聽器材實施教學。除聆聽錄音教材、配對練習、角色扮演、演說、表演短劇、及小組討論外，並佐以錄影教材，以加強實際演練與師生互動。
description.en:
This training is designated to help students establish
communicative skills through natural and authentic English,
contextualized in lively, interesting situations related to
students' immediate needs. Special focuses will be on
(1) listening for main ideas and for specific information;
(2) pronunciation exercises targeted at important features
of English, such as stress, rhythm, intonation, reduction,
and linking sounds; (3) conversational fluency providing
students with a wide range of useful conversational
expressions.  Classes will be conducted in the language labs,and students will be expected to participate in class
discussions, oral drills after listening to tapes and watching videos.  Lots of interaction with other students either in pairs or in small or large group activities will be emphasized.

description.zh: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.極限與連續，2.導數及其應用，3.不定積分與定積分，4.超越函數及其反函數，5.積分法則，6.不定型與瑕積分，7.定積分的應用，8.空間幾何與向量微積分，9.偏導數，10.重積分。
description.en: This course aims at developing comprehension of Derivation and Integral、activating capabilities of Logic Inference and Induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content includes: 1.Limits and Continuity, 2.Derivative and Application, 3.Indefinite and Definite Integral, 4.Transcendental Functions and their Inverses, 5.Techniques of Integration, 6.Indeterminate Forms and Improper Integral, 7.Application of Integration, 8.Basic Vector Analysis, 9.Partial Derivative, 10.Multiple Integration.

description.zh: 本校之普通物理課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是鼓勵同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並供給爾後修習專業課程之堅實基礎。本課程之內容包含力學、熱力學、聲學、電磁學、光學及近代物理。教授者可按每週三小時、二個學期的時間設計、再參酌各系不同之需求、加強或節略某些章節。
description.en: The course is designed for the students with engineering background. The theme of this course is to encourage students to participate in the discovery of laws and wonder of nature, and to solidate the foundation for the particular courses of study for different departments. The contents of this course include mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, electromagnetics, optics, and foundation of modern physics, etc.. The lecturers will emphasize or abridge certain contents based on the individual needs of departments. For this course, there will be 3 credits for each of two semesters,  and 3 lecture hours per week.

description.zh: 本課程的目的是為了：1.驗證物理理論之真實性，2.培養同學認真的科學態度與方法，3.培養同學數據處理的能力，4.啟發同學自行設計解決量度問題的方法。課程之施行分為上下兩學期，每一學期為一學分三小時。上學期的內容偏重力學、波動、熱力、流力之實驗，下學期的內容則偏重電磁、光學、近物之實驗。
description.en: In this course there will be 1 credit for each of two semesters, and 3 laboraborial hours per week. The first semester experiments involve mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, and waves, etc.. The second semester experiments contains electromagnetics, optics, and modern physics, etc.. The purposes of this course are 1: to identify the physical laws, 2:to cultivate the ability of data reduction of students, 4: to instruct the students solving the problems of measurements of measurements by self-designments.

description.zh: 瞭解計算機之硬体組織與資料結構等基本原理及其應用，並介紹各種程式語言特性，內容包括：1.計算機簡介：介紹計算機之演進及計算機之種類與特性，2.計算機系統簡介：介紹計算機系統的組成及軟硬体系統所含概之內容，3.資料的表示法與數字系統：介紹數系及文數字表示法，4.輸出入裝置及儲存体：介紹各種輸出入設備及資料儲存体，5.程式語言與程式設計：介紹各種程式語言結構，及撰寫之方法，6.資料結構：介紹資料在記憶体內之各種排列方法以節省記憶空間及提高存取效率，7.作業系統：介紹各種管理電腦資源的系統軟体及其作業方式，8.檔案與資料庫：介紹各種檔案的類型及資料庫之基本架構，9.資料通訊與計算機網路：介紹資料通訊之種種特性及電腦網路之結構與類別，10.人工智慧：介紹人工智慧基本概念及基本功能
description.en:
This introductory course covers the fundamentals and applications of computers.
Contents include:
1. Introduction to computer
2. Introduction to computer system
3. Data representation and number system
4. Input/Output and storage device
5. Programming language and design 
6. Data  structure
7. Operating systems
8. File and database systems
9. Data communication and computer networks
10. Artificial intelligence

name.en: Understand the basic structure of programming languages.

description.zh: 瞭解程式語言的基本結構，並以C語言為主要實習對象，其內容包含：1. 程式語言簡介：介紹各種程式語言及其特性，並對C語言之發展沿革架構及持點詳加討論，2. 資料型態：介紹C語言之資料型態及各種運算子，3. 基本輸入：介紹各種輸出入函數及輸出入實習，4. 流程控制：介紹指定指述，選擇敘述及迴圈敘述，並做實習，5. 前置處理：介紹前置處理觀念及程式實作，6. 函式：介紹主副程式及實作，7. 陣列與字串：介紹各種陣列之特性及字串與陣列之關係，並做實習，8. 結構型態：介紹結構，列舉及同位資料型態及應用實習，9. 指標：介紹指標之觀念及應用實習，10. 位元運算：介紹位元運算及應用實習，11. 檔案處理：各種檔案之介紹及檔案輸出入函數，12. 鍵盤與游標控制：介紹鍵盤、游標之控制及字元之特性，並作相關實習，13. 繪圖與音樂：介紹文字模式及繪圖模式函數，並作實習，14. C語言與物件導向：介紹C++與物件導向之關係，及物件與類別之基本定義，並作相關實習。
description.en: Understand the basic structure of programming languages. C language is used for the practice. The course includes: 1. Introduction to programming languages: introduce various programming languages as well as their properties and discuss the history, the structure and advantages of C language. 2. Data types: introduce the data types and operators of C language. 3. Basic Input and Output: introduce various input and output functions and work on their practices. 4. Processes Control: introduce assignments, select statements and loop statements and work on their practices. 5. Preprocess: introduce the concept of the preprocess and work on the programming practice. 6. Functions: introduce the main program and subroutines. 7. Array and strings: introduce the properties of various arrays as well as the relations between strings and arrays and work on their practices. 8. Structure data types: introduce structure data types and work on the practices. 9. Pointers: introduce the concept of pointe

description.zh:
1.通訊工程簡介
2.調幅與調頻
3.傳輸與接收系統
4.衛星通訊簡介
5.數據通訊簡介
6.光纖通訊簡介
7.電話系統簡介
8.行動通訊簡介
description.en:
1.Introductions
2.Amplitude and Frequency Modulations
3.Radio Transmitters and Receivers
4.Introduction to Satellite Communications
5.Introduction to Data Communications
6.Introduction to Fiber-Optic Communications
7.Introduction to Telephone System
8.Introduction to Cellular System

description.zh: 1.光的粒子與波動特性，2.光線的基本原理，3.光線經介質界面後的性質，4.稜鏡面鏡與透鏡，5.成像系統介紹，6.光欄與視場的討論，7.像差概論，8.光學儀器簡介。
description.en:
1.Photos,wave optics
2.Nature of lights
3.Properties of optical transmissions
4.Prisms and lens
5.Optical imaging system
6.Stops
7.Optical instruments

description.zh: 科技管理有別於一般管理，主要以科技產業、科技領域、科技組織、科技人才為層面，探討各項管理技巧，管理科學的應用，其主要內容包含：1.科技管理的領域，2.科技管理模式，3.科技企業組織及管理，4.科技專案管理，5.科技行銷管理，6.科技管理的新發展。
description.en:
1.The coverage of technology management. 
2.Technology management model. 
3.The organization and management of technology      corporation.
4.The management of technology projects. 
5.The management of technology marketing. 
6.The development of technology management.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
