By introducing environmental and landscape paradigms, the course provides the realization of the relation between humanistic context and composing principles of landscape architecture and the landscape expression in aesthetic, social, natural and utilitarian aspects. The content consists of
1.Landscape design history of the west and the east 
2.Landscape typology 
3.Morphology of outdoor space 
4.Landscape design elements

description.zh: 一、基本觀念：1.生活、空間與建築。2.建築類型與設計的關係。二、各種建築類型分析：1.商業設施2.辦公大樓3.飯店、旅館4.學校建築5.圖書館。
description.en: 1.The basic conception: a. Living, Space and Architecture. b. The relation between building and design. 2.The analysis of the building types: a. Commercial facility. b. Office building. c. Hotel. d. School building. E. Library.

description.zh: 本課程主要教導學生了解各結構系統的架構及概念，與其受地震力、風力之行為。1.作用於建築物之荷重、2.結構材料性質與結構需求、3.基本應力、4.受張及受壓結構、5.桁架結構、6.樑及構架系統、7.格子樑、平版及摺板系統、8.薄膜結構、9.薄殼結構
description.en: The main purpose of this course is training students to comprehend the concepts and behaviors of each kind of structural systems. 1.Loads on Structures, 2.Structural Materials and Structural Requirements, 3.Fundamental Stress, 4.Tension and Compression Structures, 5.Truss Systems, 6.Beam and Rigid Frames, 7.Grid, Slab and Folded-Plate, 8.Membrane Structures, 9.Thin Shells

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh:
一學期兩學分兩小時，共三學期六學分。每學期開授七門課，學生可從中任選一門修讀。不得重複修讀同一課程。三學期共需修畢三個不同的課目。每班選修以四十二人為限。內容包含：禮記、論語、先秦諸子選讀、朱熹學術思想、傳習錄、史記選讀、世說新語的人物、先秦寓言、詩經、駢文選讀、李杜詩、蘇東坡詩欣賞、孟子、荀子、現代詩、蘇辛詞、莊子、韓非子、六祖壇經、左傳、陶淵明及其作品、唐近體詩選讀、李商隱詩、山海經、唐宋元民間文學、志怪小說選讀、菜根譚與幽夢影、書法名作選讀。禮記－中國古代禮制文明(Ａ)
論語(Ｂ)先秦諸子選讀(Ｃ)朱熹學術思想(Ｄ)傳習錄()史記選讀
description.en: For this course, there will be 2 credits for each of three semesters.  Students are required to choose one from the seven subjects offered in each semester.  Selective readings included Book of Rites, Analects of Confucius, and Pre-Chin Works.

description.zh: 本課程以與學生日常生活相關的情境為主題，協助學生建立自然、流利的英語溝通技巧。語程側重訓練學生下列語言能力；(1)重音、縮音、連音、及語調等發音基礎訓練；(2)聆聽大意及特定資訊之能力；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式。本課程使用語言教室視聽器材實施教學。除聆聽錄音教材、配對練習、角色扮演、演說、表演短劇、及小組討論外，並佐以錄影教材，以加強實際演練與師生互動。
description.en:
This training is designated to help students establish
communicative skills through natural and authentic English,
contextualized in lively, interesting situations related to
students' immediate needs. Special focuses will be on
(1) listening for main ideas and for specific information;
(2) pronunciation exercises targeted at important features
of English, such as stress, rhythm, intonation, reduction,
and linking sounds; (3) conversational fluency providing
students with a wide range of useful conversational
expressions.  Classes will be conducted in the language labs,and students will be expected to participate in class
discussions, oral drills after listening to tapes and watching videos.  Lots of interaction with other students either in pairs or in small or large group activities will be emphasized.

description.zh: 本課程承續學生一年級的英文基礎，提供學生更多閱讀機會，並加強閱讀策略指導，以培養學生獨立閱讀、及使用適當英文表達之能力。教材以介紹英語地區文化、思想、及價值觀為主，以協助學生建立世界觀，並培養其批判思考能力。教學活動以團體討論、小組討論、段落與短文習作實施。
description.en: The objective of this course are: (1)to provide the students with abundant reading opportunities based on the students' levels;(2)to introduce various reading strategies to the students so that they may find the optimal strategies to help themselves read independently; and (3)to furnish students with competence in writing. Reading selections will be mainly focused on discussion of the cultures, thoughts and values of the English-speaking world. Students will be able to join activities which encompasses group discussion, small group discussion, paragraph writing and essay writing.

description.zh: 本課程的設計以歷史趨勢的闡述及專題研究分析二方面同時進行。內容包括民族、社會、文化精神，中國歷代政治得失之分析，中國農業經濟之特性，歷代考選、財賦、土地制度之變遷。授課方式以口頭講述為主，討論及書面報告為輔，期使學生除通盤瞭解中國歷史精神與特性外，並能具有獨立分析問題之能力。
description.en: This course is comprised of two parts: introduction to the development of the Chinese history and studies on special topics of Chinese history.  Major topics includes ethnical, social, and cultural problems; the advantages and disadvantages of the political policies of different dynasties; the characteristics of the agricultural economy in the history of China; the evolution of civil service examination systems, of financial structures, and of land policies.  Class activities include lectures and discussions.  Students are also expected to make oral and written reports so that they may have not only a comprehensive understanding of the essence of Chinese history, but also the ability of independent thinking and analysis.

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh:
大二上學期為軍訓（三）兩學分選修，在下列三單元中選擇兩者，概述如下：孫子兵法－－使學生了解我國固有兵學思想、戰爭原理、原則及戰爭指導藝術，啟發學生對兵學研究之興趣，增進軍事修養，建立全民國防共識，以維護國家安全。國防科技－－使學生對武器及武器系統與目前世界各國所發展使用的新式武器能作有系統的認識，並對我國獨立自主的國防科技發展成就有所了解，以啟發青年學生參與國防科技研究的興趣。護理與健康－－概述同大一女生部份。
國防科技－－使學生對武器及武器系統與目前世界各國所發展使用的新式武器能作有系統的認識，並對我國獨立自主的國防科技發展成就有所了解，以啟發青年學生參與國防科技研究的興趣。
護理與健康－－概述同大一女生部份。
description.en: Military Training includes three Courses at the first semester of second year. They are Sun Tzu's Art of War, National Defense Technology, Nursing and Health. Sophomores can choice any two of tem. Sun Tzu's Art of War introduces you into new area of thought of war. National Defense Technology affords you a thorough and systematic knowledge of world's high technology weapons. Nursing and Health is a course of teaching you how to take cares your own body and mind.

description.zh: 本課程分三年（六學期）教授，各學年課程教授內容如下：第一學年----主要在教導學生對美學基本素養、空間的體驗及空間構成演練，使具備建築設計之基本能力與知識，其主要授課要點如下：一.基本設計訓練及空間的體驗：1.設計基本原理的認識與操作。2.空間經驗的掌握與表達。二、空間的構成：1.基本元素的應用--線、版、體。2.比例、尺度、材質與構造的訓練。3.開口及光影的表現。4.空間的界定與串連。三、空間與造型：1.空間與造型的關係。2.量體與空間、造型。3.結構概念與空間、造型。四、機能與組織：1.行為模式分析。2.機能與動線安排。3.空間的組織。第二學年----主要在教導學生探討空間組織、造型與行為模式等使學生具備整合建築設計相關知識及操作之能力，其主要授課要點如下：1.在範圍上--以各種使用性質的單棟建築為主題。2.在設計內容上--進一步探討空間組織、造型、行為特性及模式。3.在實質因素上--訓練對基地實質環境的認識及掌握，並著重材料、構造、設備、結構等系統的結合。4.在實務人才的養成上--具備整合建築設計相關專業知識及操作的能力。第三學年----主要在教導學生對環境或都市之認知，並使其具備細部設計以至整體建築設計及監造之能力，以銜接未來之實
description.en: This course is organized, as a three-year's program that is arranged around a pattern of six semesters. The modular teaching structure is:1. First year - An introduction to basic design problem solving : concepts of point, line, plane, and space organization : principles of unity/variety ,order ,balance , proportion ,scale , etc.; orthographic projection and axonometrics ; pattern diagramming ; and basic design consequences of human activity. Studio introduction to architectural design problem solving; concepts of architectural aesthetic principles; value drawing techniques; model building; anthropometrics ; and human gathering and circulation patterns. Investigations of visual structures and their order , and exercises to develop ability to communicate about form and space. Explorations of two-dimensional and three-dimensional design through manipulation of the design elements in association with the design principles.   Emphasis on materials , techniques , and color/shape relationshi

description.zh: 本課程主要在導引學生經由傳統的繪圖觀念及技術，進入電腦繪圖的領域。訓練學生藉著繪圖軟體的功能，應用於建築設計與其他相關課程。教學內容分為上、下兩學期，第一學期講授 AutoCAD指令及應用於建築基本繪圖的練習，以二度空間繪圖指令為主。第二學期講授 AutoCAD三度空間的繪圖指令與其他進階繪圖軟體之使用。
description.en: The course objective is to train students understanding and fully employing the emerging technology of computer graphics in the architectural design process.Topics focus on both two and three-dimension computer graphics. A series of exercises seeks to expand students abilities to utilize various software packages of computer graphics.

description.zh: 待補充
description.en:
In this course student can understand the property of general material of building
and the principles of building construction, we stress those knowledge related with component composition, that student can used in their design work.

description.zh:
介紹建築計劃的基本精神，方法，及各種類型建築的建築計劃案例分析
一．建築計劃基本精神
１．建築與生活、生產的關係
２．建築計劃之定位
３．建築計劃之構成、內容
４．建築計劃學的發展過程
二．建築計劃的方法
１．需求的產生與界定
２．建築計劃的調查方法
３．建築計劃的分析方法
４．建築計劃的定量計劃（尺寸與規模計劃）
５．建築計劃的調查方法（空間、機能、集合與複合）
三．建築計劃案例分析
description.en: Introduce the basic philosophy & methods of architecture planning. Case studies ofdifferent building types. The topic include：1、the basic philosophy of architecture planningl	the relationship between planning and living、productionl	the scope of architecture planning l	the content of architecture planningl	the developing period of architecture planning2、the methods of architecture planningl	the happening of needs & its definitionl	the investigation methods of architecture planning l	the analysis methods of architecture planning l	the quantity planning of architecture planning （size & scale planning）l	space、function、accumulate & complex 3、case study of architecture planning

description.zh: 本課程主要在論述以建築規劃設計者之立場如何利用建築設備系統控制建築物理環境影響因子，以及其與建築物銜接介面之統合關係。本課程為第一階段之系列課程，其內容包括：1. 地球環境變遷對環境控制系統之衝擊2. 空調設備系統3. 特殊空調節能設備4. 電氣設備系統5. 設施管理6.設備更新
description.en: This course mainly discuss issues about architecture planning how a designer uses architecture equipment system to control architecture physical Environmental Impact, and its integrate relation with Building's connecting medium.This course is the first step of a series course, its content including:1. The Impact of Earth Environmental Change to Environmental Control System2. Air Conditional Equipment System  3. Special Air Conditional Energy Conservation System4. Electric equipment5. Facility Management6. Renewal of Equipment System

name.en: Introduction to History of Western Architecture

description.zh: 本課程主要在教導學生對西方(歐洲及西亞)認識歷史建築之演進過程與思考涵構，並使學生具備西方文化歷史與思想的相關知識，其主要授課內容如下：1.在範圍上--自古埃及、西亞、古典建築、基督教建築、中世紀的大教堂時代以至文藝復興及17、18世紀的建築歷史。2.在思想上--自希臘的文化與哲學思想談起，以至各時代之政治、宗教與社會文明之演進，瞭解歷史涵構及其對建築的表現。3.在建築上─針對每一時期的建築表現，瞭解其構造方法、材料應用及相關細部特徵。
一、	從廣域範圍介紹自然生態與人文資源永續發展之道二、	藉由我國現階段環境發展策略及個案經驗，實務討論生態環境課題與措施。三、	課程內容涵蓋台灣自然與生態環境現況、森林、山坡地、農地、能源、海洋、自然保育、人文環境保育、環境法規、環境影響評估。
description.en: 1.	It will introduce the sustainable development of natural ecology and human resources through wide range.2.	It will emphasize with students to discuss the issues and strategies on environmental ecology. Those discussions will depend on national environmental development policies and special cases in recent years.3.	This course will include Taiwan nature and ecology, forest, lands lope , farmland, coastal area, natural conservation , human resources ,environmental impact assessment.

description.zh:
教學內容：一、 建築表現之功能與意義。
          二、 比例與明暗之訓練。
description.en:
1. The methodology of Architecture presentation.
2. Proportion and contrast.

description.zh: 本課程以建築設計的相關知識與操作手法之介紹為主，輔以大量的案例說明。
description.en: The course attempts to give an introduction to methods of architectural design from aspects of both substantive knowledge and process skills. A large number of projects will be referred as examples.

description.zh: 一、說明環境心理學的意義、發展背景、適用範圍及研究架構，並介紹環境心理學的方法論及在建築規劃設計上之運用；二、針對環境心理學與實質環境相關之重點課題，研討視覺美學、特性使用者活動行為模式、群居型態社交行為、空間場所性能體認等現象與實質設施需求之互動關係，並由實際案例之研討、模擬，以熟悉調查、觀察之操作。

本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本軍訓課程分四學期，大一上學期為軍訓（一）零學分，概述如下：戰爭概論－－使學生了解戰爭的涵義與指導要領，藉以體認「好戰必亡，忘戰必危」的真義，以樹立國防共識，維護國家安全，並增進對國家生存、民族發展的必勝信念。陸軍概要－－使學生了解我國陸軍之沿革、使命、特性、組織體系、教育訓練、情報、作戰、後勤及未來發展，增進對陸軍之認識。
description.en: The military training courses comprise four semesters. During the first semester, there are two subjects which are the War Conception and the Introduction of Army. The War Conception is designed to make student understand the definition of War and the guidelines of the War. By knowing the War, we can realize that the bellicose must lead to destruction, while the ignorant lead to risk, and build the consensus that the National Defense and security is crucial to National survival and development. The introduction of Army is designed to make student understand the army's history, task, character, origination, intelligence, operation, logistics and the future development.

description.zh: 孫中山先生創立中華民國之立國精神在於三民主義之自由平等、民主、均富，此精神也就是依據的原則。本課程以中華民國憲法為經，　國父建國之理想步驟為緯，俾使學生充分瞭解我國之立國精神所在，並認識我國憲法的精神及內涵，培養學生維護憲法之尊嚴，以及愛國家愛民族之情操。
description.en: The Republic of China is established by Dr. Sun Yat-sen on the basis of Equality, Democracy, and Equated Distribution of Wealth, which are also the principles in San-Ming-Zhu-Yi (literally, Three Principles of the People). This course is made up of two focuses: the Constitution of the Republic of China and the ideal approaches which lead to the establishment of the very nation to the purpose that the students would realize the constitutional spirit and the underlying meaning, so as to cultivate a patriotic love for the country and its people.

description.zh:
一學期兩學分兩小時，共三學期六學分。每學期開授七門課，學生可從中任選一門修讀。不得重複修讀同一課程。三學期共需修畢三個不同的課目。每班選修以四十二人為限。內容包含：禮記、論語、先秦諸子選讀、朱熹學術思想、傳習錄、史記選讀、世說新語的人物、先秦寓言、詩經、駢文選讀、李杜詩、蘇東坡詩欣賞、孟子、荀子、現代詩、蘇辛詞、莊子、韓非子、六祖壇經、左傳、陶淵明及其作品、唐近體詩選讀、李商隱詩、山海經、唐宋元民間文學、志怪小說選讀、菜根譚與幽夢影、書法名作選讀。禮記－中國古代禮制文明(Ａ)
論語(Ｂ)先秦諸子選讀(Ｃ)朱熹學術思想(Ｄ)傳習錄()史記選讀
description.en: For this course, there will be 2 credits for each of three semesters.  Students are required to choose one from the seven subjects offered in each semester.  Selective readings included Book of Rites, Analects of Confucius, and Pre-Chin Works.

description.zh: 本課程設計重點有三：(1)藉由精選的中級程度教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
description.en: This course is designed (1) to strengthen students' previously required knowledge in English with basic grammatical ideas and sentence patterns reviewed through selected materials at intermediate level; (2) to get the most (gist) out of the reading and appreciate the writing strategy of diverse interests. Focuses will be on explanation of difficult words, phrases, and syntax, as well as on analysis of fostering a basic writing skill; (3) to reinforce the competence and performance of listening, speaking, reading and writing by practice.

description.zh: 本課程以與學生日常生活相關的情境為主題，協助學生建立自然、流利的英語溝通技巧。語程側重訓練學生下列語言能力；(1)重音、縮音、連音、及語調等發音基礎訓練；(2)聆聽大意及特定資訊之能力；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式。本課程使用語言教室視聽器材實施教學。除聆聽錄音教材、配對練習、角色扮演、演說、表演短劇、及小組討論外，並佐以錄影教材，以加強實際演練與師生互動。
description.en:
This training is designated to help students establish
communicative skills through natural and authentic English,
contextualized in lively, interesting situations related to
students' immediate needs. Special focuses will be on
(1) listening for main ideas and for specific information;
(2) pronunciation exercises targeted at important features
of English, such as stress, rhythm, intonation, reduction,
and linking sounds; (3) conversational fluency providing
students with a wide range of useful conversational
expressions.  Classes will be conducted in the language labs,and students will be expected to participate in class
discussions, oral drills after listening to tapes and watching videos.  Lots of interaction with other students either in pairs or in small or large group activities will be emphasized.

description.zh: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.極限與連續，2.導數及其應用，3.不定積分與定積分，4.超越函數及其反函數，5.積分法則，6.不定型與瑕積分，7.定積分的應用，8.空間幾何與向量微積分，9.偏導數，10.重積分。
description.en: This course aims at developing comprehension of Derivation and Integral、activating capabilities of Logic Inference and Induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content includes: 1.Limits and Continuity, 2.Derivative and Application, 3.Indefinite and Definite Integral, 4.Transcendental Functions and their Inverses, 5.Techniques of Integration, 6.Indeterminate Forms and Improper Integral, 7.Application of Integration, 8.Basic Vector Analysis, 9.Partial Derivative, 10.Multiple Integration.

description.zh: 此二學分一學期的物理，是特別為建築設計系所開設。為因應該系之特別需求，課程內容雖然也包含力學、熱力學、聲學及電學等，但特別偏重在基本計算能力及應用方面。
description.en: In this course there will be 3 credits for one semester; and 2 lecture hours per week. The course is specially designed for the students of department of architecture.  The contents of this course involve mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, and electricties, etc., and stress heavily on fundamental calculations and applications.

description.zh: 本課程分三年（六學期）教授，各學年課程教授內容如下：第一學年----主要在教導學生對美學基本素養、空間的體驗及空間構成演練，使具備建築設計之基本能力與知識，其主要授課要點如下：一.基本設計訓練及空間的體驗：1.設計基本原理的認識與操作。2.空間經驗的掌握與表達。二、空間的構成：1.基本元素的應用--線、版、體。2.比例、尺度、材質與構造的訓練。3.開口及光影的表現。4.空間的界定與串連。三、空間與造型：1.空間與造型的關係。2.量體與空間、造型。3.結構概念與空間、造型。四、機能與組織：1.行為模式分析。2.機能與動線安排。3.空間的組織。第二學年----主要在教導學生探討空間組織、造型與行為模式等使學生具備整合建築設計相關知識及操作之能力，其主要授課要點如下：1.在範圍上--以各種使用性質的單棟建築為主題。2.在設計內容上--進一步探討空間組織、造型、行為特性及模式。3.在實質因素上--訓練對基地實質環境的認識及掌握，並著重材料、構造、設備、結構等系統的結合。4.在實務人才的養成上--具備整合建築設計相關專業知識及操作的能力。第三學年----主要在教導學生對環境或都市之認知，並使其具備細部設計以至整體建築設計及監造之能力，以銜接未來之實
description.en: This course is organized, as a three-year's program that is arranged around a pattern of six semesters. The modular teaching structure is:1. First year - An introduction to basic design problem solving : concepts of point, line, plane, and space organization : principles of unity/variety ,order ,balance , proportion ,scale , etc.; orthographic projection and axonometrics ; pattern diagramming ; and basic design consequences of human activity. Studio introduction to architectural design problem solving; concepts of architectural aesthetic principles; value drawing techniques; model building; anthropometrics ; and human gathering and circulation patterns. Investigations of visual structures and their order , and exercises to develop ability to communicate about form and space. Explorations of two-dimensional and three-dimensional design through manipulation of the design elements in association with the design principles.   Emphasis on materials , techniques , and color/shape relationshi

description.zh: 本課程教學目標在教導初學者電腦基本概念及軟硬體系統構架之認識，使學生熟悉電腦基本應用及操作技巧，培養使用電腦興趣與習慣，運用電腦解決學業上問題。主要授課內容包括：1.個人電腦實地操作與認識、2.DOS 指令運用、3.基本語言使用、4.套裝軟體應用：a.文書處理軟體:PE2、WORD、b.試算表軟體:如LOTUS1-2-3、EXCEL、c.資料處理軟體：如DBASE、FOX、d.其他軟體、5.網路操作。
description.en: The course objective is to provide students the conceptual framework for employing computing technology to aid the studies of academic works and delivers the practical skills for making immediate and effective use of the emerging digital facilities.Topics focus on the operations of personal computer and its peripheries , usages  of various software packages, and the practical applications of Internet.

description.zh: 本課程目標針對大一新生入門介紹建築專業分支領域。由建築學基本涵構作概略介紹，輔以案例介紹及適當實地參觀研討，進而了解建築學相關知識體系，並對未來四年建築專業課程內容有全盤性認識，進ㄧ步結合未來出路願景。著重訓練思考及觀察能力，以利學生認識建築學之整體關聯性，進而建立其全方位學習藍圖。內容包括建築相關產業與建造程序、體驗建築、建築單位尺寸、建築結構系統之美、建築設計風格、建築教育、新一代建築師、建築構造與材料、建築的社會文化性、建築與環境共生、建築與都市發展、建築相關法令等。
description.en: This course gives a brief introduction with those knowledge related architecture and construction for the freshmen of department of Architecture, that students may have a whole concept about each professional courses for the future 4 years. This course is focus on training the ability of thinking & observation of students to establish the integrated structure of Architecture.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技四年級上學期實施選修專項分組教學，課程修畢有一學分並計入畢業學分內。由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: In first semester, Senior students can choose to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. When they are finishing the course that can get the credit, also can account in graduate credit.  For Senior level, Classes are giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 學生與教授討論擬定專題研究的題目，在教授的個別指導下，進行實驗研究，並將研究結果寫成報告（每學期至多只能修習2 學分）。四技修四學期而在第一學期修完時如欲換題目時需等老師將第一學期成績打出後再徵求原來及新老師都同意才可更換題目。
description.en: The topic of the special projects is discussed and together by the students and advisor.  Under the face-to -face instruction of the advisor the student will conduct the research and experiments, and the final report at the end of the semester.  The students can't change their chosen topic during the semester, except after the grade of the term being filed and under the consents of the original advisor and new advisor.The topic of the special projects is discussed and together by the students and advisor.  Under the face-to -face instruction of the advisor the student will conduct the research and experiments, and the final report at the end of the semester.  The students can't change their chosen topic during the semester, except after the grade of the term being filed and under the consents of the original advisor and new advisor.

description.zh:
先修課程：無。本實習內容為汽車傳動系統及車身鈑噴實習，包含汽車車身及機車車架拆裝調整檢修，傳動系統元件拆裝調整檢修，車身測量，車身研磨、焊接及液壓施力設備之操作，金屬鈑金件之維修，車架及車身之校正及調整，門緣、車頭、玻璃及防潮條之更換，碰撞損壞之維修；塗裝及噴漆設備，塗裝及噴漆材料，配色技巧，車輛之塗裝及噴漆實際操作，完成品之品質檢驗。
95學年度前入學者適用下列實習內容: 車輛電系和可程式控制器，包括：引擎電系，充電系檢測，點火系檢測，電池之檢測與換裝，電腦控制系檢測，電腦診斷系統檢測，其他電控系統檢測；可程式控制器系統規劃，可程式控制器之整合與評估，可程式控制器應用。
description.en:
Automobile Drive Trains , Body Refinishing and Painting Service Shop Practice , Include the Repair, Overhaul and Trouble-Shooting of Automobile Transmission and Chassis, Automobile Body and Motorcycle Frame Assembly, Basic Dimensional Measurements, Inspection and Adjustments. The practice of automobile body sanding, welding and hydraulic straightening equipment; repairing of the sheet-metal panels; frame and body alignment; door trim, headlinings, glass and weatherstripping replacement; repairing of the collision damages ; Automobile refinishing and painting equipment, refinishing and painting materials , color matching, the practice of refinishing and painting of the vehicle , painting quality testing .
For those students who enter the school before 2006 Fall Semester , the practice contents are :
Electrical and Electronic System, Battery, Starting System, Charging System, Ignition System, Computer Control System, Computer Diagnostic System. Programmable logic controller (PLC) combi

description.zh:
先修課程:負責教授同意
自動控制概論，汽車自動變速簡介，液動基本原理，液體接合扭力變換器，行星齒輪與超速控制，自動閥控系統與換檔裝置，液壓油與液壓油之冷卻，電動自動變速簡介，各式變速箱舉例。
description.en:
Introduction to Automatic Control, Introduction to Automobile
Transmission, Hydraulic Principle, Hydraulic Coupling, Planetary Gears, Automatic Transmission Valve System, Hydraulic Oil Cooling System, Introduction to Electrical Transmission System.

description.zh: 先修課程:負責教授同意．煞車動力學，煞車性能之極限，液壓煞車系統及元件，鼓式煞車，碟式煞車，駐車煞車，真空輔助動力煞車，液壓輔助動力煞車，電動輔助動力煞車，防鎖死煞車系統．
description.en: Brake Dynamics, LImit of Braking Performance, Hydraulic-Brake-System Components, Drum Brake, Disc Brake, Parking Brake, Vacuum-Assist Power Brake, Hydraulic-Assist Power Brake, Electro-Hydraulic-Assist Power Brake, Antilock Brakes System。

description.zh:
先修課程:4402014或負責教授同意
空調的基本原理，冷凍的基本循環原理：冷煤及管路、壓縮機冷凝器、膨脹閥等熱負荷之計算，冷、暖氣循環系統之負荷平衡計算，冷凍空調之控制系統介紹與計算，冷凍空調之電路系統介紹與計算。
description.en: Fundamentals: Tables of Thermodynamic Properties, Principles of Heat Transfer Classification of Refrigeration, Vapor Compression Refrigeration System, Compressors, Condensers, Evaporators, Expansion Values, Refrigerants, Piping and Accessories, Load Calculations, Control.

description.zh: 品質管制之基本觀念，應用統計與機率來推定及控制產品品質，管制圖，抽樣原理，品質成本，品管系統設計及系統績效之評估。
description.en: Fundamental Concepts of Quality Control, Use Statistics and Probability to Infer and Control Products Quality, Control Chart Principle of Sampling Quality Cost Q.C System Design and Performance Estimate.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh:
先修課程:4402012或負責教授同意
介紹各種不同方法分析（如能量法及 Castigliano 定理），破壞理論，材料選用，可靠度概念，軸及軸承，離合器及煞車器，傳動元件（如皮帶、鏈條、齒輪），軸聯接器，飛輪，彈簧等。
description.en: Introduction to Analysis Methods (Energy method & Castigliano theorem), Failure Theory, Material Selection, Introduction to Reliability, Shafts and Bearings, Clutches and Brakes, Power Transmission Elements (Belts, Chains, Gears), Couplings, Flywheels, Springs.

description.zh: 引擎型式及運轉，引擎循環之理想模式，引擎設計及運轉之重要參數，燃料空氣混合之熱力學分析，工作流體的特性，實際引擎循環，引擎燃燒現象及分析，污染控制，引擎控制介紹引擎性能及特性分析。
description.en: Engine Types and Their Operation, Ideal Models of Engine Cycles, Engine Design and Operating Parameters, Thermodynamic of Fuel-Air Mixtures, Properties of Working Fluids, Practical Models of Engine Cycles, Combustion Features and Analysis, Pollutant Control, Engine Control, Engine Performance and Characteristics Analysis

description.zh: 學生與教授討論擬定專題研究的題目，在教授的個別指導下，進行實驗研究，並將研究結果寫成報告（每學期至多只能修習2 學分）。四技修四學期而在第一學期修完時如欲換題目時需等老師將第一學期成績打出後再徵求原來及新老師都同意才可更換題目。
description.en: The topic of the special projects is discussed and together by the students and advisor.  Under the face-to -face instruction of the advisor the student will conduct the research and experiments, and the final report at the end of the semester.  The students can't change their chosen topic during the semester, except after the grade of the term being filed and under the consents of the original advisor and new advisor.The topic of the special projects is discussed and together by the students and advisor.  Under the face-to -face instruction of the advisor the student will conduct the research and experiments, and the final report at the end of the semester.  The students can't change their chosen topic during the semester, except after the grade of the term being filed and under the consents of the original advisor and new advisor.

description.zh: 1.磁路分析  2.電機－機械能量轉換  3.直流機  4.旋轉磁場與電磁設備  5.對稱感應機 6.同步機  7.無刷直流機  8.步進馬達  9.雙相伺服與單相感應機馬達
description.en: This course is designed to teach the students to learn electro-mechanical energy conversion principles & electric machinery fundamentals, and then study the construction, types, principles, characteristics, control circuits transformer, induction machines, synchronous machines, direct-current machines, synchronous converter and specialized dynamos.

description.zh: 燃油控制，點火控制，爆震控制，空燃比控制，惰速控制，變速控制，煞車控制，牽引力控制，懸吊控制，轉向控制，安全氣囊。
description.en: Fuel Control, Ignition Control, Knocking Control, Air-Fuel Ratio Control, Idle Speed Control, Transmission Control, Braking Control, Traction Control, Suspension Control, Steering Control, Air Bag.

description.zh: 基本觀念及其領域、非線性代數之數值解法、聯立方程式之數值解、多項式內外插、微分、積分、常微分方程、起始、邊界值問題之數值解法。
description.en: Fundamental Concepts and Its Scope, Numerical Solution of Nonlinear Algebraic Equations and Sets of Equations, Interpolating Polynomials, Numerical Differentiation and Numerical Integration, Numerical Solution of Ordinary Differential Equations, Numerical Solution of Boundary-Value Problems and Initial-Value Problems.

description.zh: 運動方程式，一維振動（自由及強制），振動量測，二維振動，多維振動及機械應用說明。
description.en: Equation of Motion, Single-Degree-of-Freedom Vibration (Free and Forced), Measurement of Vibrations, Two-Degree-of-Freedom Vibration, Multiple- Degree-of-Freedom Vibration and its Applications in Mechanical Engineering.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh:
一學期兩學分兩小時，共三學期六學分。每學期開授七門課，學生可從中任選一門修讀。不得重複修讀同一課程。三學期共需修畢三個不同的課目。每班選修以四十二人為限。內容包含：禮記、論語、先秦諸子選讀、朱熹學術思想、傳習錄、史記選讀、世說新語的人物、先秦寓言、詩經、駢文選讀、李杜詩、蘇東坡詩欣賞、孟子、荀子、現代詩、蘇辛詞、莊子、韓非子、六祖壇經、左傳、陶淵明及其作品、唐近體詩選讀、李商隱詩、山海經、唐宋元民間文學、志怪小說選讀、菜根譚與幽夢影、書法名作選讀。禮記－中國古代禮制文明(Ａ)
論語(Ｂ)先秦諸子選讀(Ｃ)朱熹學術思想(Ｄ)傳習錄()史記選讀
description.en: For this course, there will be 2 credits for each of three semesters.  Students are required to choose one from the seven subjects offered in each semester.  Selective readings included Book of Rites, Analects of Confucius, and Pre-Chin Works.

description.zh: 本課程以與學生日常生活相關的情境為主題，協助學生建立自然、流利的英語溝通技巧。語程側重訓練學生下列語言能力；(1)重音、縮音、連音、及語調等發音基礎訓練；(2)聆聽大意及特定資訊之能力；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式。本課程使用語言教室視聽器材實施教學。除聆聽錄音教材、配對練習、角色扮演、演說、表演短劇、及小組討論外，並佐以錄影教材，以加強實際演練與師生互動。
description.en:
This training is designated to help students establish
communicative skills through natural and authentic English,
contextualized in lively, interesting situations related to
students' immediate needs. Special focuses will be on
(1) listening for main ideas and for specific information;
(2) pronunciation exercises targeted at important features
of English, such as stress, rhythm, intonation, reduction,
and linking sounds; (3) conversational fluency providing
students with a wide range of useful conversational
expressions.  Classes will be conducted in the language labs,and students will be expected to participate in class
discussions, oral drills after listening to tapes and watching videos.  Lots of interaction with other students either in pairs or in small or large group activities will be emphasized.

description.zh: 本課程承續學生一年級的英文基礎，提供學生更多閱讀機會，並加強閱讀策略指導，以培養學生獨立閱讀、及使用適當英文表達之能力。教材以介紹英語地區文化、思想、及價值觀為主，以協助學生建立世界觀，並培養其批判思考能力。教學活動以團體討論、小組討論、段落與短文習作實施。
description.en: The objective of this course are: (1)to provide the students with abundant reading opportunities based on the students' levels;(2)to introduce various reading strategies to the students so that they may find the optimal strategies to help themselves read independently; and (3)to furnish students with competence in writing. Reading selections will be mainly focused on discussion of the cultures, thoughts and values of the English-speaking world. Students will be able to join activities which encompasses group discussion, small group discussion, paragraph writing and essay writing.

description.zh: 本課程的設計以歷史趨勢的闡述及專題研究分析二方面同時進行。內容包括民族、社會、文化精神，中國歷代政治得失之分析，中國農業經濟之特性，歷代考選、財賦、土地制度之變遷。授課方式以口頭講述為主，討論及書面報告為輔，期使學生除通盤瞭解中國歷史精神與特性外，並能具有獨立分析問題之能力。
description.en: This course is comprised of two parts: introduction to the development of the Chinese history and studies on special topics of Chinese history.  Major topics includes ethnical, social, and cultural problems; the advantages and disadvantages of the political policies of different dynasties; the characteristics of the agricultural economy in the history of China; the evolution of civil service examination systems, of financial structures, and of land policies.  Class activities include lectures and discussions.  Students are also expected to make oral and written reports so that they may have not only a comprehensive understanding of the essence of Chinese history, but also the ability of independent thinking and analysis.

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh:
大二上學期為軍訓（三）兩學分選修，在下列三單元中選擇兩者，概述如下：孫子兵法－－使學生了解我國固有兵學思想、戰爭原理、原則及戰爭指導藝術，啟發學生對兵學研究之興趣，增進軍事修養，建立全民國防共識，以維護國家安全。國防科技－－使學生對武器及武器系統與目前世界各國所發展使用的新式武器能作有系統的認識，並對我國獨立自主的國防科技發展成就有所了解，以啟發青年學生參與國防科技研究的興趣。護理與健康－－概述同大一女生部份。
國防科技－－使學生對武器及武器系統與目前世界各國所發展使用的新式武器能作有系統的認識，並對我國獨立自主的國防科技發展成就有所了解，以啟發青年學生參與國防科技研究的興趣。
護理與健康－－概述同大一女生部份。
description.en: Military Training includes three Courses at the first semester of second year. They are Sun Tzu's Art of War, National Defense Technology, Nursing and Health. Sophomores can choice any two of tem. Sun Tzu's Art of War introduces you into new area of thought of war. National Defense Technology affords you a thorough and systematic knowledge of world's high technology weapons. Nursing and Health is a course of teaching you how to take cares your own body and mind.

description.zh:
先修課程:4401011或負責教授同意
介紹結構體在受到張力、壓力、剪力、扭力及彎曲等外力狀態下之變形，分析應力，應變及變形，莫耳圓，壓力容器，樑，柱。
description.en: Introduction of the deformation, Strain and stress of structure (Beam, Column, Pressure vessel) under several different loading condition equations, Compression, Shear force, Torsion and Bending moment.

description.zh:
先修課程:負責教授同意
物質熱力學特性，改變能量形式之基本原理，熱力學第一及第二定律，可逆性與可用性，動力循環，冷凍循環，混合氣，化學反應。
description.en: Thermodynamic Properties of Substance, Energy Forms, The First Law of Thermodynamics, The Second Law of Thermodynamics, Irreversibility & Availability, Power Cycle, Refrigeration Systems, Mixtures, Chemical Reactions.

description.zh: 先修課程： 無。本實習內容為汽車底盤實習，包含底盤綜合保養檢修、轉向懸吊及煞車系統元件拆裝調整檢修、檢修調整汽車前輪定位、拆裝輪胎總成及校正平衡、操作使用底盤動力計、煞車及偏滑實驗儀器。
description.en: Automobile Chassis Service Shop Practice , the basic inspection, adjustment and repair of Automobile Chassis System, Include the Automobile Suspension systems, Steering systems and Braking systems, Tire Repair and Balance practice, Wheel-Alignment practice , Chassis dynamometer Experiment , Brake performance and Slide Test .

description.zh:
先修課程:微積分或負責教授同意
常微分方程式，線性常微分方程式，拉普拉氏轉換，級數及傅立葉級數，線性代數及矩陣，積分定理。
description.en: Ordinary Differential Equations, Laplace Transforms, Power Series, Linear Algebra, Matrices.

description.zh: 1.布林代數與邏輯閘  2.組合邏輯  3.同步循序邏輯  4.同步循序設計  5.非同步循序邏輯  6.非同步循序設計
description.en:
This course offers students a basic concept about how to design a logic circuit. A couple of examples proposed in this course which have appeared repeatedly in the design of digital systems will be presented to illustrate the design concept.
1.Boolean Algebra and Logic Minimization  2.Combinational Network Design  3.Analysis of Synchronous Sequential Networks  4.Design of Synchronous Sequential  5.Analysis of Asynchronous Sequential  6.Design of Asynchronous Sequential Networks

description.zh: C、QBASIC、FORTRAN或LISP，區段架構（變數、輸入／輸出），迴圈（ for,while,do,while ），選擇敘述（ if-else敘述，switch敘述），函數（函數的資料傳遞，外部變數），陣列與字串（陣列中元素之表達，字串），指標（指標與陣列，雙重指標：指向指標的指標），結構、等位以及 ROMBIOS，檔案（標準I/O，記錄I/O，隨機存取），如何設計一個大程式（分開編譯，記憶體式）。
description.en: Computer Languages: C, QBASIC, FORTRAN or LISP (Compiler or Interpreter) Including such as Statements of Flow Control: (Sequence, Selectionand Iteration), Basic Data Type and Input/Ouput Statement Subprograms(Parameters Called by Value and Address), Array, String and pointerStruct, Enum, Union and File How to Design a Large Program (Project,Memory Mode, Library).

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本軍訓課程分四學期，大一上學期為軍訓（一）零學分，概述如下：戰爭概論－－使學生了解戰爭的涵義與指導要領，藉以體認「好戰必亡，忘戰必危」的真義，以樹立國防共識，維護國家安全，並增進對國家生存、民族發展的必勝信念。陸軍概要－－使學生了解我國陸軍之沿革、使命、特性、組織體系、教育訓練、情報、作戰、後勤及未來發展，增進對陸軍之認識。
description.en: The military training courses comprise four semesters. During the first semester, there are two subjects which are the War Conception and the Introduction of Army. The War Conception is designed to make student understand the definition of War and the guidelines of the War. By knowing the War, we can realize that the bellicose must lead to destruction, while the ignorant lead to risk, and build the consensus that the National Defense and security is crucial to National survival and development. The introduction of Army is designed to make student understand the army's history, task, character, origination, intelligence, operation, logistics and the future development.

description.zh: 孫中山先生創立中華民國之立國精神在於三民主義之自由平等、民主、均富，此精神也就是依據的原則。本課程以中華民國憲法為經，　國父建國之理想步驟為緯，俾使學生充分瞭解我國之立國精神所在，並認識我國憲法的精神及內涵，培養學生維護憲法之尊嚴，以及愛國家愛民族之情操。
description.en: The Republic of China is established by Dr. Sun Yat-sen on the basis of Equality, Democracy, and Equated Distribution of Wealth, which are also the principles in San-Ming-Zhu-Yi (literally, Three Principles of the People). This course is made up of two focuses: the Constitution of the Republic of China and the ideal approaches which lead to the establishment of the very nation to the purpose that the students would realize the constitutional spirit and the underlying meaning, so as to cultivate a patriotic love for the country and its people.

description.zh:
一學期兩學分兩小時，共三學期六學分。每學期開授七門課，學生可從中任選一門修讀。不得重複修讀同一課程。三學期共需修畢三個不同的課目。每班選修以四十二人為限。內容包含：禮記、論語、先秦諸子選讀、朱熹學術思想、傳習錄、史記選讀、世說新語的人物、先秦寓言、詩經、駢文選讀、李杜詩、蘇東坡詩欣賞、孟子、荀子、現代詩、蘇辛詞、莊子、韓非子、六祖壇經、左傳、陶淵明及其作品、唐近體詩選讀、李商隱詩、山海經、唐宋元民間文學、志怪小說選讀、菜根譚與幽夢影、書法名作選讀。禮記－中國古代禮制文明(Ａ)
論語(Ｂ)先秦諸子選讀(Ｃ)朱熹學術思想(Ｄ)傳習錄()史記選讀
description.en: For this course, there will be 2 credits for each of three semesters.  Students are required to choose one from the seven subjects offered in each semester.  Selective readings included Book of Rites, Analects of Confucius, and Pre-Chin Works.

description.zh: 本課程設計重點有三：(1)藉由精選的中級程度教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
description.en: This course is designed (1) to strengthen students' previously required knowledge in English with basic grammatical ideas and sentence patterns reviewed through selected materials at intermediate level; (2) to get the most (gist) out of the reading and appreciate the writing strategy of diverse interests. Focuses will be on explanation of difficult words, phrases, and syntax, as well as on analysis of fostering a basic writing skill; (3) to reinforce the competence and performance of listening, speaking, reading and writing by practice.

description.zh: 本課程以與學生日常生活相關的情境為主題，協助學生建立自然、流利的英語溝通技巧。語程側重訓練學生下列語言能力；(1)重音、縮音、連音、及語調等發音基礎訓練；(2)聆聽大意及特定資訊之能力；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式。本課程使用語言教室視聽器材實施教學。除聆聽錄音教材、配對練習、角色扮演、演說、表演短劇、及小組討論外，並佐以錄影教材，以加強實際演練與師生互動。
description.en:
This training is designated to help students establish
communicative skills through natural and authentic English,
contextualized in lively, interesting situations related to
students' immediate needs. Special focuses will be on
(1) listening for main ideas and for specific information;
(2) pronunciation exercises targeted at important features
of English, such as stress, rhythm, intonation, reduction,
and linking sounds; (3) conversational fluency providing
students with a wide range of useful conversational
expressions.  Classes will be conducted in the language labs,and students will be expected to participate in class
discussions, oral drills after listening to tapes and watching videos.  Lots of interaction with other students either in pairs or in small or large group activities will be emphasized.

description.zh: 本校之普通物理課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是鼓勵同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並供給爾後修習專業課程之堅實基礎。本課程之內容包含力學、熱力學、聲學、電磁學、光學及近代物理。教授者可按每週三小時、二個學期的時間設計、再參酌各系不同之需求、加強或節略某些章節。
description.en: The course is designed for the students with engineering background. The theme of this course is to encourage students to participate in the discovery of laws and wonder of nature, and to solidate the foundation for the particular courses of study for different departments. The contents of this course include mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, electromagnetics, optics, and foundation of modern physics, etc.. The lecturers will emphasize or abridge certain contents based on the individual needs of departments. For this course, there will be 3 credits for each of two semesters,  and 3 lecture hours per week.

description.zh:
先修課程:4401051或負責教授同意
銜接圖學及基本幾何學觀念以繪製機械之零件圖與組合圖，並熟悉交線展開之原理與繪圖管路、鋼架、油壓氣壓及機械相關圖。
description.en: Connecting the fundamental Engineering graphics and the geometrical drawing technology to mechanical parts and assembly drawing. Also The emphasis should be Included such as mastering the intersections and development theorem , Steel structures, Hydraulic and Fluid Systems and Related mechanical Drawing.

description.zh: 汽車之動力性、汽車總論、引擎、底盤、傳動及電系、燃油經濟性、制動性、操縱穩定性、平順性及行駛性。
description.en: Automotive Service and Shop Work, Automobile Engines, Automobile Electrical and Electronic Equipment, Engine Performance and Drive-ability, Automotive Engine Service, Automotive Drive Trains, Automotive Chassis.

description.zh: 1.簡介 2.網路定律及元件 3.電路分析簡介 4.節點電壓及迴路電流 5.網路特性 6.一階電路 7.二階電路 8.線性非時變電路 9.電力網路與穩定度分析 10.電路幾何學
description.en:
This course is designed for students who have taken the course in introductory electrical engineering.
1. Basic Concepts  2.Kirchhoff's Laws and Elements.  3.Circuit Analysis.  4.Node Voltages and Loop Currents. 5.Characteristics of Circuits.  6.First-Order Circuits  7.Second-Order Circuits   8.Linear Time-Invariant Circuits  9.Network Functions and Stability  10.Circuit Topology and General Circuit Analysis

description.zh: 1.作業系統簡介 2.網際網路 3.文書處理軟體使用 4.資料表格化與整理 5.簡報製作 6.網頁製作 7.數字系統與二進碼 8.數位邏輯簡介 9.計算機組織與架構 10.資料結構
description.en: To provide an overview of current computer technologies.  Students will learn basic introductions to computer operating systems, internet software, office software (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, etc), WWW homepage programming, number system, logic gate, processor structure, and data structure.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技四年級上學期實施選修專項分組教學，課程修畢有一學分並計入畢業學分內。由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: In first semester, Senior students can choose to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. When they are finishing the course that can get the credit, also can account in graduate credit.  For Senior level, Classes are giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 指導學生進行研究專題，以培育其研發能力。每一位學生必須經指導教授選定題目，獨立或數位同學成一組完成硬體或軟體專題，並書寫印製，經系公開展示與評分。
description.en: Teaching students to do the research work and to write the papers. Before graduation, the students have possessed the ability to do the R/D work. Each student must be through professor's instrution's instructions to select the topics of  special project, personal or group work should be completed the project's hardware or software and issued the paper. An announcement has been made by the department, then get the grade and credit.

description.zh: 空調設計基礎、空調冷暖負載計算、空氣線圖應用分析、主要設備規範擬定、空調系統規劃與設備選用分析、風管工程設計、水配管工程設計、設備配置與裝設工程、材料與成本分析、節約省能規劃設計。
description.en: Fundamentals of HVAC system design, cooling/ heating load estimation, analysis of applied psychometrics charts, schematic design of HVAC system, main equipment selection, main equipment specification, air duct & water piping system design, equipments layout & installation, materials & cost analysis. HVAC's energy saving & energy efficient planning.

description.zh: 建築物勘測、負載計算實例實做、風管製圖、水管路系統製圖、冷凍空調配電設計實例實做、設備安裝－位置選定、基礎、避震及噪音控制、工程估價實例。
description.en: Building's survey, case study- load calculation, air duct system schematic drawing, water piping system schematic drawing. HVAC & R electric power system design & drawing, equipment installations-layout, foundation, vibration & noisy control planning. Engineering cost estimation practices & analysis.

description.zh: 本課程著重冷凍系統和空調系統能源的分析，探討構成系統的主要元件－壓縮機、蒸發器和冷凝器的耗能，和各泵、冰水盤管、空調箱及風／水管路系統的能源耗損，進而對整個系統運轉時的效率予以檢討。最後提出各種改善方法，節約能源和減少電力契約容量的技術，以使學生具有節能省電的正確理論觀念和實務技術。
description.en:
This lesson is focused on the energy analyses of refrigeration systems and air-conditioning systems. The operating defects of compressors, evaporators and
condensers are to be investigated. Also the energy consumption's of pumps, fan coils air-handling units and duct/water systems are studied. The over all performance of the entire system is thus discussed. Several methods to improve the shortages and the techniques to energy conservation and electricity demand cut-down will be proposed.
The students should understand correctly the theory of energy conservation and the
technology to improve the systems.

description.zh: 室內氣候、室外氣候、熱環境、空氣環境－汙染物、換新與通風、音環境、人體舒適度、室內空氣品質控制、潔淨室之規劃設計。
description.en: Indoor and outside air conditions, thermal environment, air pollutants, fresh air and ventilation, noise level, human comfort, indoor air quality control, design of clean room.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh: 由介紹基本熱傳有關現象，配合熱力守恆有關公式之應用，討論各種熱交換環境下應考慮之因素，分析熱傳導、熱對流、熱輻射及相變熱傳之計算方法。並將要更深入地探討在各不同熱傳導系統內所可能形成之熱力分佈現象，以期學習者能以淺入深地對相關熱傳導系統工程設計上培養出最佳能力。
description.en:
Introduction of basic heat transfer phenomena, using thermodynamic conservation equations to discuss the parameters under different heat exchange circumstances, heat conduction, heat convection, heat radiation and phase change are analyzed, discussion
on the heat transfer problems in application to cultivate heat transfer design capability.

description.zh: 基本控制系統的動作方式、位置控制、比例控制、積分控制、微分控制、各種組合控制、氣壓控制裝置、電動及電子控制裝置、液壓控制裝置、空調設備上的各種控制包括溫度、壓力、風量、濕度等之控制。
description.en:
To provide students with the concepts of control actions:
two position control, proportional control, floating control, integral control, derivative control; to familiarize students with pneumatic control devices, fludic control devices, damper & valves, elementary control systems on HVAC & R systems, include: temperature control, humidity control, static pressure control, flow control and so on.

name.zh: 冷凍空調自動控制實習

description.zh: 各種壓縮機起動控制、順序控制、溫度控制、濕度控制、水流量控制、外氣控制、焓值控制、氣壓控制、電動控制、電子控制等實習。
description.en: To familiarize students with practice of compressor control, sequence control, temperature control, humidity control, flow control, outdoor air control, enthalpy control, and pneumatic control, electric control, electronic control on HVAC systems.

description.zh: 本課程利用範例文章閱讀、分析訓練學生寫作能力，從段落發展成為完整組織的作文。其中包括標題句、段落、各類文體，並加強句型變化，及高階文法概念。
description.en:
The purpose of this course is to develop reading and writing
skills from paragraph to composition with the modeled samples.  The texts  include the reading and writing of topic sentence, paragraph development, and the introduction to various styles of composition with a view to reinforce sentences  variety and advanced grammatical ideas.

description.zh: 各種冷煤壓縮機簡介，容積式壓縮機效率分析，離心式壓縮機分析，各種送風機簡介，送風機應用，泵之應用分析。
description.en: Introduction to refrigerant compressors, efficiency analysis of volumetric compressors, analysis of centrifugal compressors, introduction to fans, applications of fans, and application of pumps.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本課程以與學生日常生活相關的情境為主題，協助學生建立自然、流利的英語溝通技巧。語程側重訓練學生下列語言能力；(1)重音、縮音、連音、及語調等發音基礎訓練；(2)聆聽大意及特定資訊之能力；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式。本課程使用語言教室視聽器材實施教學。除聆聽錄音教材、配對練習、角色扮演、演說、表演短劇、及小組討論外，並佐以錄影教材，以加強實際演練與師生互動。
description.en:
This training is designated to help students establish
communicative skills through natural and authentic English,
contextualized in lively, interesting situations related to
students' immediate needs. Special focuses will be on
(1) listening for main ideas and for specific information;
(2) pronunciation exercises targeted at important features
of English, such as stress, rhythm, intonation, reduction,
and linking sounds; (3) conversational fluency providing
students with a wide range of useful conversational
expressions.  Classes will be conducted in the language labs,and students will be expected to participate in class
discussions, oral drills after listening to tapes and watching videos.  Lots of interaction with other students either in pairs or in small or large group activities will be emphasized.

description.zh: 本課程承續學生一年級的英文基礎，提供學生更多閱讀機會，並加強閱讀策略指導，以培養學生獨立閱讀、及使用適當英文表達之能力。教材以介紹英語地區文化、思想、及價值觀為主，以協助學生建立世界觀，並培養其批判思考能力。教學活動以團體討論、小組討論、段落與短文習作實施。
description.en: The objective of this course are: (1)to provide the students with abundant reading opportunities based on the students' levels;(2)to introduce various reading strategies to the students so that they may find the optimal strategies to help themselves read independently; and (3)to furnish students with competence in writing. Reading selections will be mainly focused on discussion of the cultures, thoughts and values of the English-speaking world. Students will be able to join activities which encompasses group discussion, small group discussion, paragraph writing and essay writing.

description.zh: 本課程的設計以歷史趨勢的闡述及專題研究分析二方面同時進行。內容包括民族、社會、文化精神，中國歷代政治得失之分析，中國農業經濟之特性，歷代考選、財賦、土地制度之變遷。授課方式以口頭講述為主，討論及書面報告為輔，期使學生除通盤瞭解中國歷史精神與特性外，並能具有獨立分析問題之能力。
description.en: This course is comprised of two parts: introduction to the development of the Chinese history and studies on special topics of Chinese history.  Major topics includes ethnical, social, and cultural problems; the advantages and disadvantages of the political policies of different dynasties; the characteristics of the agricultural economy in the history of China; the evolution of civil service examination systems, of financial structures, and of land policies.  Class activities include lectures and discussions.  Students are also expected to make oral and written reports so that they may have not only a comprehensive understanding of the essence of Chinese history, but also the ability of independent thinking and analysis.

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh:
大二上學期為軍訓（三）兩學分選修，在下列三單元中選擇兩者，概述如下：孫子兵法－－使學生了解我國固有兵學思想、戰爭原理、原則及戰爭指導藝術，啟發學生對兵學研究之興趣，增進軍事修養，建立全民國防共識，以維護國家安全。國防科技－－使學生對武器及武器系統與目前世界各國所發展使用的新式武器能作有系統的認識，並對我國獨立自主的國防科技發展成就有所了解，以啟發青年學生參與國防科技研究的興趣。護理與健康－－概述同大一女生部份。
國防科技－－使學生對武器及武器系統與目前世界各國所發展使用的新式武器能作有系統的認識，並對我國獨立自主的國防科技發展成就有所了解，以啟發青年學生參與國防科技研究的興趣。
護理與健康－－概述同大一女生部份。
description.en: Military Training includes three Courses at the first semester of second year. They are Sun Tzu's Art of War, National Defense Technology, Nursing and Health. Sophomores can choice any two of tem. Sun Tzu's Art of War introduces you into new area of thought of war. National Defense Technology affords you a thorough and systematic knowledge of world's high technology weapons. Nursing and Health is a course of teaching you how to take cares your own body and mind.

description.zh: (1)基本電路元件介紹; (2)基本電路理論回顧; (3)半導體特性介紹; (4)半導體二極體電路分析技巧; (5)半導體二極體之應用:整流器,濾波器,剪波器,箝位器,倍壓器; (6)其他特殊二極體:發光二極體,齊納二極體,…; (7)雙極接合面電晶體工作原理; (8)雙極接合面電晶體直流偏壓電路; (9)雙極接合面電晶體交流小信號電路分析; (10)場效電晶體之分類:接合面型,金氧半增強型,金氧半衰減型,金氧半垂直型,金氧半互補型; (11)場效電晶體工作原理; (12)場效電晶體直流偏壓電路; (13)場效電晶體交流小信號電路分析
description.en: (1) Introduction to basic circuit components; (2)The review of basic circuit theories; (3)Introduction to the characteristics of semiconductors; (4)Circuit analysis techniques for semiconductor PN diode; (5)The applications of PN diode: Rectifier, Filter, Clipper, Clamper, and Voltage-doubler; (6)Special diodes: Light emitting diode(LED), Zener diode, etc.; (7)The operation principles of bipolar junction transistor(BJT); (8)DC biasing circuits for BJTs; (9)Small signal analysis for BJT circuits; (10)The classification of field effect transistor(FET): JFET, Enhancement-MOS, Depletion-MOS, VMOS, and CMOS; (11)The operation principles of FET; (12)DC bias circuits for FETs; (13)Small signal analysis for FET circuits

description.zh: 本課程將介紹冷凍工程，以及其應用系統，內容涵蓋如下：一.冷凍工程原理及系統。二.食品冷凍工業。三.工業冷凍。四.超低溫冷凍系統與應用。五.冷凍運輸。六.特殊冷凍應用。
description.en: This course introduces the refrigeration engineering and its system application. The contents cover the following topics: 1) The principles and system application of refrigeration engineering, 2) Food refrigeration, 3) Industrial refrigeration, 4) Extra-Low-Temperature refrigeration system and application, 5) Transport refrigeration, 6) Special application of refrigeration.

description.zh:
本課程將介紹工程上、物理上系統解析的相關數學工具，內容包括五大項：
一 常微分方程式：一階，二階，及高階常微分方程，拉譜拉斯轉換，   特殊函數。
二 向量幾何與分析：矩陣行列式及特徵問題。
三 傅立葉級數，積分及轉換。
四 偏微分方程及邊界值問題。
五 複變分析及映射轉換。
description.en:
This course intends to inbtroduce the mathematical principles and practices that today's engineers need to know. The course contents are 
1. Ordinary Differential Eqs: 1st order, 2nd order and higher    order ODEs. Laplace transform, special function.
2. Vector Algebra and Vector Analysis: Matrixs and    Determinants, Eigenvalve problems.
3. Fourier Series, Integral and Transforms.
4. Partial Differential Equations and Boundary Value    Problems.
5. Complex Analysis: complex Integration, conformal mapping    and Applications.

description.zh: 管路處理、焊接設備及焊接練習、空氣性質測定、冷媒性質測定、基本冷凍循環實習、冷凍系統處理、基本冷凍機電路實習、基本冷凍系統組件之配置。
description.en: To familiarize students with practice of working with tubing, using with oxyacetylene brazing equipment, air properties measurement, identifying refrigerant by T-P curve, evacuating a system, charging and testing a system, wiring of basic electrical circuit and control circuit.

description.zh: 網路拓樸理論及特立勤定理；節點與網路分析；迴路與切集分析；狀態變數法；自然頻率；網路函數；雙埠網路；計算機輔助分析（PSPICE）；傅氏分析；拉氏轉換。
description.en:
1. The power of single phase and poly- phase, and complex    frequency and power factor correction; the phasor    conception to the Damped sinusoidal forcing function.
2. The resonant of frequency response, quality factor and    the width of a resonance     response curve of half-power    frequencies.
3. Magnetically coupled circuits and Two-port networks.
4. Fourier Analysis and Laplace Transform Techniques.

description.zh: 能源概論，熱力學，非再生能源，再生能源的利用，能源的有效變換，未來能源的發展形態，有效能源之解析與評估，能源效率之管理。
description.en: General introduction, thermodynamics, non-renewable energy, use of renewable energy, energy conversion, future development, evaluation and analysis of energy effectiveness, energy effectiveness, energy management.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本軍訓課程分四學期，大一上學期為軍訓（一）零學分，概述如下：戰爭概論－－使學生了解戰爭的涵義與指導要領，藉以體認「好戰必亡，忘戰必危」的真義，以樹立國防共識，維護國家安全，並增進對國家生存、民族發展的必勝信念。陸軍概要－－使學生了解我國陸軍之沿革、使命、特性、組織體系、教育訓練、情報、作戰、後勤及未來發展，增進對陸軍之認識。
description.en: The military training courses comprise four semesters. During the first semester, there are two subjects which are the War Conception and the Introduction of Army. The War Conception is designed to make student understand the definition of War and the guidelines of the War. By knowing the War, we can realize that the bellicose must lead to destruction, while the ignorant lead to risk, and build the consensus that the National Defense and security is crucial to National survival and development. The introduction of Army is designed to make student understand the army's history, task, character, origination, intelligence, operation, logistics and the future development.

description.zh: 孫中山先生創立中華民國之立國精神在於三民主義之自由平等、民主、均富，此精神也就是依據的原則。本課程以中華民國憲法為經，　國父建國之理想步驟為緯，俾使學生充分瞭解我國之立國精神所在，並認識我國憲法的精神及內涵，培養學生維護憲法之尊嚴，以及愛國家愛民族之情操。
description.en: The Republic of China is established by Dr. Sun Yat-sen on the basis of Equality, Democracy, and Equated Distribution of Wealth, which are also the principles in San-Ming-Zhu-Yi (literally, Three Principles of the People). This course is made up of two focuses: the Constitution of the Republic of China and the ideal approaches which lead to the establishment of the very nation to the purpose that the students would realize the constitutional spirit and the underlying meaning, so as to cultivate a patriotic love for the country and its people.

description.zh:
一學期兩學分兩小時，共三學期六學分。每學期開授七門課，學生可從中任選一門修讀。不得重複修讀同一課程。三學期共需修畢三個不同的課目。每班選修以四十二人為限。內容包含：禮記、論語、先秦諸子選讀、朱熹學術思想、傳習錄、史記選讀、世說新語的人物、先秦寓言、詩經、駢文選讀、李杜詩、蘇東坡詩欣賞、孟子、荀子、現代詩、蘇辛詞、莊子、韓非子、六祖壇經、左傳、陶淵明及其作品、唐近體詩選讀、李商隱詩、山海經、唐宋元民間文學、志怪小說選讀、菜根譚與幽夢影、書法名作選讀。禮記－中國古代禮制文明(Ａ)
論語(Ｂ)先秦諸子選讀(Ｃ)朱熹學術思想(Ｄ)傳習錄()史記選讀
description.en: For this course, there will be 2 credits for each of three semesters.  Students are required to choose one from the seven subjects offered in each semester.  Selective readings included Book of Rites, Analects of Confucius, and Pre-Chin Works.

description.zh: 本課程設計重點有三：(1)藉由精選的中級程度教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
description.en: This course is designed (1) to strengthen students' previously required knowledge in English with basic grammatical ideas and sentence patterns reviewed through selected materials at intermediate level; (2) to get the most (gist) out of the reading and appreciate the writing strategy of diverse interests. Focuses will be on explanation of difficult words, phrases, and syntax, as well as on analysis of fostering a basic writing skill; (3) to reinforce the competence and performance of listening, speaking, reading and writing by practice.

description.zh: 本課程以與學生日常生活相關的情境為主題，協助學生建立自然、流利的英語溝通技巧。語程側重訓練學生下列語言能力；(1)重音、縮音、連音、及語調等發音基礎訓練；(2)聆聽大意及特定資訊之能力；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式。本課程使用語言教室視聽器材實施教學。除聆聽錄音教材、配對練習、角色扮演、演說、表演短劇、及小組討論外，並佐以錄影教材，以加強實際演練與師生互動。
description.en:
This training is designated to help students establish
communicative skills through natural and authentic English,
contextualized in lively, interesting situations related to
students' immediate needs. Special focuses will be on
(1) listening for main ideas and for specific information;
(2) pronunciation exercises targeted at important features
of English, such as stress, rhythm, intonation, reduction,
and linking sounds; (3) conversational fluency providing
students with a wide range of useful conversational
expressions.  Classes will be conducted in the language labs,and students will be expected to participate in class
discussions, oral drills after listening to tapes and watching videos.  Lots of interaction with other students either in pairs or in small or large group activities will be emphasized.

description.zh: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1.極限與連續，2.導數及其應用，3.不定積分與定積分，4.超越函數及其反函數，5.積分法則，6.不定型與瑕積分，7.定積分的應用，8.空間幾何與向量微積分，9.偏導數，10.重積分，11.級數。
description.en: This course aims at developing comprehension of Derivation and Integral、activating capabilities of Logic Inference and Induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content includes: 1.Limits and Continuity, 2.Derivative and Application, 3.Indefinite and Definite Integral, 4.Transcendental Functions and their Inverses, 5.Techniques of Integration, 6.Indeterminate Forms and Improper Integral, 7.Application of Integration, 8.Basic Vector Analysis, 9.Partial Derivative, 10.Multiple Integration, 11.Infinite Series.

description.zh: 本校之普通物理課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是鼓勵同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並供給爾後修習專業課程之堅實基礎。本課程之內容包含力學、熱力學、聲學、電磁學、光學及近代物理。教授者可按每週三小時、二個學期的時間設計、再參酌各系不同之需求、加強或節略某些章節。
description.en: The course is designed for the students with engineering background. The theme of this course is to encourage students to participate in the discovery of laws and wonder of nature, and to solidate the foundation for the particular courses of study for different departments. The contents of this course include mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, electromagnetics, optics, and foundation of modern physics, etc.. The lecturers will emphasize or abridge certain contents based on the individual needs of departments. For this course, there will be 3 credits for each of two semesters,  and 3 lecture hours per week.

description.zh: 本課程的目的是為了：1.驗證物理理論之真實性，2.培養同學認真的科學態度與方法，3.培養同學數據處理的能力，4.啟發同學自行設計解決量度問題的方法。課程之施行分為上下兩學期，每一學期為一學分三小時。上學期的內容偏重力學、波動、熱力、流力之實驗，下學期的內容則偏重電磁、光學、近物之實驗。
description.en: In this course there will be 1 credit for each of two semesters, and 3 laboraborial hours per week. The first semester experiments involve mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, and waves, etc.. The second semester experiments contains electromagnetics, optics, and modern physics, etc.. The purposes of this course are 1: to identify the physical laws, 2:to cultivate the ability of data reduction of students, 4: to instruct the students solving the problems of measurements of measurements by self-designments.

description.zh: 內容包括各種能量形式、能源轉換、物質之熱力性質、熱力學第一、第二定律、各種動力循環以及冷凍循環。
description.en: To provide students with the concepts and abilities of analyzing energy forms, energy transformation, properties of substance, first law & second law of thermodynamics, power cycles, refrigeration cycles and heat pump cycles.

description.zh: DOS命令，物件導向程式語言Turbo C++整合發展環境，條件與迴圈，陣列與指標，函數，結構，類別與物件，檔案，溢載及繼承關係，文字視窗的應用，繪圖的應用，資料處理的應用，資料結構的應用，數位信號處理的應用，數值分析的應用。
description.en: The course intends to have students to be familiar with computer language programming. It also introduces different computer languages with the purpose of developing student's capability of designing a complete program.

description.zh: 本課程將從基本空調相關之冷媒化學理論入門，藉由各種冷媒系統之氣、液相臨界溫度、壓力與比容積等性質，各純物質成份與混合物之熱力學性質、蒸氣壓與相變化焓值，標準自由能形成，熱容、表面張力、黏度、熱傳導、擴散係數以及相平衡等因素，探討比較各別冷煤系統化學上之外延及內含性質。此外亦配合相關課程進行實驗操作，加深學習效果。
description.en: This course presents a critical review of various estimation procedures for a limited number of properties of gases and liquids: Critical and other pure component properties, PVT and thermodynamic properties of pure components and mixtures, vapor pressures, and phase-change enthalpies, standard enthalpies of formation, standard gibbs energies, thermal conductivity, diffusion coefficients, and phase equilibrium. Comparison of experimental and estimated values are normal shown in tables to indicate reliability.

description.zh: 教授立體三維空間的投影觀念、幾何學製圖方法，訓練繪製草圖、各種物件之三視圖、零件／組合圖及各式剖面變位圖之能力；並能正確標註尺寸及加工表面符號，公差與配合。並且熟悉交線展開之原理，使具備繪製各式管路、鋼架、氣油壓及機械設備之相關標準工程圖的能力。
description.en: Instructing the concepts of orthographic projection of 3D space and the methods of geometry graphics. Training the skills to raw sketch, various 3D views, parts/assembly drawings and cross-sectional views. Learning to mark dimensions, manufacturing surface symbols tolerance and fittings correctly. This lesson also demands students to able to be familiarize the intersections and development theorem in order to draw the steel structures, hydraulic and fluid systems, and related mechanical devices as the standard engineering drawings.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本軍訓課程分四學期，大一上學期為軍訓（一）零學分，概述如下：戰爭概論－－使學生了解戰爭的涵義與指導要領，藉以體認「好戰必亡，忘戰必危」的真義，以樹立國防共識，維護國家安全，並增進對國家生存、民族發展的必勝信念。陸軍概要－－使學生了解我國陸軍之沿革、使命、特性、組織體系、教育訓練、情報、作戰、後勤及未來發展，增進對陸軍之認識。
description.en: The military training courses comprise four semesters. During the first semester, there are two subjects which are the War Conception and the Introduction of Army. The War Conception is designed to make student understand the definition of War and the guidelines of the War. By knowing the War, we can realize that the bellicose must lead to destruction, while the ignorant lead to risk, and build the consensus that the National Defense and security is crucial to National survival and development. The introduction of Army is designed to make student understand the army's history, task, character, origination, intelligence, operation, logistics and the future development.

description.zh: 孫中山先生創立中華民國之立國精神在於三民主義之自由平等、民主、均富，此精神也就是依據的原則。本課程以中華民國憲法為經，　國父建國之理想步驟為緯，俾使學生充分瞭解我國之立國精神所在，並認識我國憲法的精神及內涵，培養學生維護憲法之尊嚴，以及愛國家愛民族之情操。
description.en: The Republic of China is established by Dr. Sun Yat-sen on the basis of Equality, Democracy, and Equated Distribution of Wealth, which are also the principles in San-Ming-Zhu-Yi (literally, Three Principles of the People). This course is made up of two focuses: the Constitution of the Republic of China and the ideal approaches which lead to the establishment of the very nation to the purpose that the students would realize the constitutional spirit and the underlying meaning, so as to cultivate a patriotic love for the country and its people.

description.zh:
一學期兩學分兩小時，共三學期六學分。每學期開授七門課，學生可從中任選一門修讀。不得重複修讀同一課程。三學期共需修畢三個不同的課目。每班選修以四十二人為限。內容包含：禮記、論語、先秦諸子選讀、朱熹學術思想、傳習錄、史記選讀、世說新語的人物、先秦寓言、詩經、駢文選讀、李杜詩、蘇東坡詩欣賞、孟子、荀子、現代詩、蘇辛詞、莊子、韓非子、六祖壇經、左傳、陶淵明及其作品、唐近體詩選讀、李商隱詩、山海經、唐宋元民間文學、志怪小說選讀、菜根譚與幽夢影、書法名作選讀。禮記－中國古代禮制文明(Ａ)
論語(Ｂ)先秦諸子選讀(Ｃ)朱熹學術思想(Ｄ)傳習錄()史記選讀
description.en: For this course, there will be 2 credits for each of three semesters.  Students are required to choose one from the seven subjects offered in each semester.  Selective readings included Book of Rites, Analects of Confucius, and Pre-Chin Works.

description.zh: 本課程設計重點有三：(1)藉由精選的中級程度教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
description.en: This course is designed (1) to strengthen students' previously required knowledge in English with basic grammatical ideas and sentence patterns reviewed through selected materials at intermediate level; (2) to get the most (gist) out of the reading and appreciate the writing strategy of diverse interests. Focuses will be on explanation of difficult words, phrases, and syntax, as well as on analysis of fostering a basic writing skill; (3) to reinforce the competence and performance of listening, speaking, reading and writing by practice.

description.zh: 本課程以與學生日常生活相關的情境為主題，協助學生建立自然、流利的英語溝通技巧。語程側重訓練學生下列語言能力；(1)重音、縮音、連音、及語調等發音基礎訓練；(2)聆聽大意及特定資訊之能力；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式。本課程使用語言教室視聽器材實施教學。除聆聽錄音教材、配對練習、角色扮演、演說、表演短劇、及小組討論外，並佐以錄影教材，以加強實際演練與師生互動。
description.en:
This training is designated to help students establish
communicative skills through natural and authentic English,
contextualized in lively, interesting situations related to
students' immediate needs. Special focuses will be on
(1) listening for main ideas and for specific information;
(2) pronunciation exercises targeted at important features
of English, such as stress, rhythm, intonation, reduction,
and linking sounds; (3) conversational fluency providing
students with a wide range of useful conversational
expressions.  Classes will be conducted in the language labs,and students will be expected to participate in class
discussions, oral drills after listening to tapes and watching videos.  Lots of interaction with other students either in pairs or in small or large group activities will be emphasized.

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養學生熟悉日常生活英語會話及以正常速度聽講之能力。課程內容取材自學生周遭所熟悉事務, 藉由媒體傳播素材來訓練學生經常聽講之能力，並在課堂中研討其內容以達到運用之目的。
description.en: This course is designed to familiarize students with daily spoken English as well as listening and speaking skills. The content includes a wide variety of authentic multimedia materials-printed audio and video texts.  This gives students an opportunity for both recognition of different speaking styles and an in-depth, culture-rich understanding of the topics from multiple perspectives. Real-life situations are rehearsed in the classroom, with role-plays, situational activities, excerpts from newspapers and magazines and interviews with real people. Speaking practices based on day-to-day language are emphasized in class.

description.zh: 本課程藉由不同情境之英語錄影帶, 以及專題的語彙題目來提供一個英語談話的情境使學生能學習合宜的詞句。小組討論、角色演練、口頭報告皆為主要教學技巧，俾能增強學生之聽說能力。
description.en: This course aims at providing an English-speaking environment to allow students learn about the speaking strategies and common expressions used in different situations through viewing video films and oral practice. Small-group/pair discussion and role-playing are also parts of the methodologies.

description.zh: 本課程分為兩部分：（1）英文文法觀念的溫故知新，並引導學生將正確的文法觀念運用在閱讀與寫作上，學生可加強基本句型練習、句子改正及句型修正。相關討論包括直述句、引述句、句型變化與修飾;（2）英語修辭法：聽講溝通的有效原理原則。課堂討論主題包括：指稱、一致、倒裝等修辭觀念。修習本課後，學生對出現在相同邏輯意義語境中， 利用不同表達方式以凸顯各種語意的方式與內涵，當有更進一步的體認。
description.en: This course is divided into two parts: (a) The first part is designed for the students to  familiarize themselves with English grammatical framework in relation to reading and writing. A review of grammatical ideas at high level is reinforced by correcting sentence errors, and revising awkward usage of words or sentence structures. The main subjects include English sentence structures, verbal usages, conjunctions, and sequences. Related topics for class discussion cover direct and indirect speech, sentence transformation and modification of sentences; (b) The second half of the course focuses on English rhetoric--principles of effective written and spoken communication. Topics for class discussion include reference, coherence, reverse structures and some related rhetorical concepts. It is hoped that the students will know better the significance brought about by the variations of different expressions that occur in the similar linguistic contexts.

description.zh: 本課程透過希臘英雄的偉大冒險故事以及希伯來聖經傳統中的聖哲事蹟來探索早期西方文明的兩大源頭（希臘與希伯來文化）所呈現出的主要風貌。
description.en: The main features of two great sources of early western civilizations, that is (1) Greek mythology and tragedies, and (2) Hebrew Biblical tradition, will be introduced to the students in the most exciting stories about Greek heroes and heroines as well as Biblical figures and events.

description.zh: 本課程精選有關教育與文化之文章，引導學生從閱讀中印證，比較各種文化和教育現象，並鼓勵學生從各種不同角度蒐集資料，俾使課堂討論呈現時代性與多元化的觀點。
description.en: This course is intended to help students develop their English proficiency through readings and discussions on discourses of education and culture.  Students are encouraged to react to the experiences described, relate them to their own lives and express their feelings and thoughts through interactive speaking activities.

description.zh: 培養正確的英語發音與腔調，並訓練學生熟悉如何使用音標記錄發音以及辨認學習者在英語發音中經常發生的問題。  課程中也介紹英語語音系統的主要規則。
